Job_Description: บันทึกรายจ่ายและรายการรับสินค้า(ซื้อสินค้า) จากใบแจ้งหนี้ บันทึกรายจ่ายและรายการรับสินค้า(ซื้อสินค้า) จากเอกสารสำรองจ่าย บันทึกรายการภาษีต่างๆ (หัก ณ ที่จ่าย / เอกสารใบกำกับภาษี(ภาษีซื้อ) / อื่นๆ) ออกเอกสารใบสำคัญจ่าย/ใบรวมจ่าย ตามเอกสารที่ได้รับ ตรวจสอบการเคลื่อนไหวของเงิน (ขาจ่าย) เตรียมและตรวจสอบข้อมูลรายการภาษีต่างๆ แอดมินเกี่ยวกับบัญชีทั้งหมด ประสานงานต่างๆให้กับผู้จัดการ Record Expense and Good Received (Purchase) Record incoming Invoice and Reimbursement Record Expense Tax Related Generate Payment Note according to Invoice Received Monitor Cash and Credit Movement (Out) Monitor aging of expense open items account Prepare Tax Submission (Expense) Admin to all Accounting Related Assist Manager to all related fields

Job_Title: Sports & Activities Administrator
Job_Description: We are seeking a dedicated and enthusiastic Sports & Activities Administrator with a strong administrative background to join our team. The coordinator will be responsible for overseeing and managing various sports and activities within the organisation, ensuring smooth logistics, coordinating fixtures and tournaments, and maintaining administrative tasks related to sports events. The successful candidate will be detail-oriented, organised, and possess excellent communication skills to liaise with stakeholders, coaches, and participants effectively. Responsibilities and Duties: Fixtures/Tournaments Management: Plan, schedule, and coordinate fixtures and tournaments for various sports and activities. Collaborate with teams, coaches, and other institutions to organise inter-house tournaments and external competitions. Ensure all logistical arrangements for tournaments are in place, including venues, equipment, and referees. House Tournaments: Facilitate and supervise house tournaments, fostering a competitive and enjoyable environment for participants. Coordinate teams, schedule matches, and maintain scores and results. Swim Galas/Sports Days/Liaise with Local Stadiums: Organise and oversee swim galas and sports days, coordinating with relevant staff, students, and parents. Liaise with local stadiums or sports facilities for hosting events and securing necessary permits. Administrative Tasks: Maintain an organised and up-to-date calendar of sports events and activities. Handle logistics, including transportation arrangements for away games or events. Coordinate with referees, Thai coaches, and estates personnel to ensure smooth operations during events. Arrange catering needs for participants and spectators during tournaments. Medical & Dietary Needs: Collaborate with relevant medical staff and coaches to address medical and dietary requirements of participants. Ensure necessary medical personnel are available during events, if required. Equipment Management: Manage sports equipment inventory, ensuring all items are in good condition and readily available for curriculum lessons, CCAs and ECAs. Coordinate equipment maintenance and repairs as needed and inform Head of PE and Director of Sport of any items in need of repair. Order new equipment when necessary, following budget guidelines. Lesson Set-up: Assist in setting up lessons and training sessions for various sports and activities. Ensure all necessary materials and equipment are ready for each session. Certificate Design/Printing - PA: Design and print certificates for participants, winners, and achievers in various sports and activities. Prepare and organise presentations or announcements during award ceremonies. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Sports Management, Physical Education, or a related field (preferred). Proven experience in sports event coordination and administration. Excellent organisational and time-management skills. Strong interpersonal and communication abilities. Ability to work well under pressure and manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Proficient in using computer software for scheduling, administrative tasks, and certificate design. Knowledge of sports rules, regulations, and best practices is desirable. This role presents an exciting opportunity for a proactive individual to contribute to the vibrant sports culture within our organisation. If you are passionate about sports, highly organised, and excel in administrative tasks, we encourage you to apply and become a part of our dynamic team. Professionalism: To arrive at school punctually. To follow the dress code at school. To uphold the image of the school both while in and out of school. Qualities, Qualifications and Skills Essential: To demonstrate our values, especially kindness, good manners and wisdom. A bachelor’s degree or equivalent. Good English and Thai oracy and literacy. Good numeracy skills The ability to work well as part of a team. A friendly, professional and approachable manner with colleagues, students and parents. To understand the requirement to maintain confidentiality between colleagues, students and parents. Competent ICT skills. Important Note: King’s College International School Bangkok is fully committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and expects all staff to share this commitment. Any offer of employment will be subject to the receipt of an enhanced DBS disclosure/ICPC, a criminal records check, suitably translated if you teach outside of the UK, satisfactory references, and medical clearance.

Job_Title: Marketing Support Officer
Job_Description: Summary of Role: Marketing Support Officer is the glue that holds together marketing departments by providing the support for marketing teams and campaigns. While some of the work is administrative is reports, marketing support officer can also be involved in creative tasks such as writing marketing copy, managing social media accounts (including creating images and videos), and coordinating press releases. Your responsibilities: Follow and update social media and Communication Trends regularly for team. Answer customer questions and chat (Facebook, Line OA, Shopee, TikTok) both inside and outside of hours Prepare reports, presentations and documents which support marketing as well sales team. Providing support to the team with ad hoc analysis and/or the underlying data as needed Handle and respond to administrative enquiries from internal and external customers Working closely with the team to ensure client requests are delivered and help bring new ideas for design and content creation Perform other duties as assigned Requirement: Bachelor's Degree in any related. At least 3 year working experience. Experience in responding to chat pages and setting up a live promotion via social media platforms as well as the marketplace is a plus Must have a knowledge of the back-end systems of various platforms. (Facebook, Line, Shopee, TikTok). Must have the ability to work well with the team, be patient and collaborative while have the ability to manage multiple projects Able to use basic computer programs such as Excel, Word, PowerPoint etc., and some design tools such as Canva, Adobe Illustrator, Photoshops or Capcut etc. Why us? Change to work with multiple international and top brands A supportive working environment which will help you grows your skills and future work career Location close to BTS line. Working condition and benefit: Office hours: Mon- Fri 9.30-18.30 (May be some late evening to finished up the projects) Social Security Fund Group Insurance Annual Leave Business Leave If all these seem like you, please send us your CV and let’s talk possibilities.  Please note that the only shortlisted candidates with the full details will be contacted.

Job_Title: Assistant Recruitment Manager (Mass Recruitment - PC...
Job_Description: This position is responsible for managing all aspects of the recruiting function for mass positions by partnering to develop and implement effective sourcing, selection, offering and processes aligned with the talent acquisition needs of the organization Job Description: Perform sourcing to fill open positions and anticipate future needs Deliver talent candidate in a timely and efficient manner. Keep the team updated on best practices, business. Plan and conduct recruitment, selection (interviews, screening calls etc.), and offering process Execute comprehensive short-term strategies in branding and sourcing Take steps to ensure positive candidate experience Enhance the recruitment process by soliciting feedback from candidates and all customers Organize and/or attend career fairs, assessment centers or other events Track recruitment information, then create reports and identify areas of improvement Manage relationships with vendors and customers Coach staff in talent acquisition team Qualification: Bachelor or Master Degree in Business Administration or related fields Minimum 3-5 years experience in Recruitment or Recruitment Agency Proven experience in mass recruitment Good problem-solving and analytical skills Strong in stakeholder management, candidate management and negotiation skills Good coordination and facilitation skills Able to work independently and work well under pressure Work Location: KSPT Building, BTS Ploenchit, Bangkok Good remuneration package will be rewarded and also excellent future career growth opportunity is available for the right candidate. Please submit your application letter, resume stating qualifications and experiences, stating recent & expected salary to the following address: Human Resources Department Krungsri Consumer 17 Fl., Krungsri Ploenchit Tower 550 Ploenchit Rd., Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 Contact person: Sunanta Contact number: 086-7515878

Job_Title: Vice President, Office Management
Job_Description: Job Responsibilities Develop and implement strategic plans for efficient office management. Oversee the design and layout of office spaces to maximize productivity and collaboration. Manage and optimize the use of office resources, including office supplies, equipment, and facilities. Implement cost-effective measures to enhance resource efficiency. Oversee the maintenance and security of office facilities. Manage relationships with vendors and service providers for facility-related services. Lead and manage the office management team. Foster a positive and collaborative work environment. Develop and manage budgets related to office management. Monitor expenses and identify cost-saving opportunities. Job Qualifications Bachelor's degree or higher in a relevant field. Proven experience in office management roles, with a preference for managerial or senior-level experience. Strong leadership and team management skills. Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities. Effective communication skills in both Thai and English. Demonstrated responsibility, dedication, and ability to work under pressure.

Job_Title: Technical Campaign Coordinator
Job_Description: Technical Specialist – Technical Campaign Coordinator (EGR) assists the Technical Service Manager with specific administrative tasks related to Technical Campaigns, in particular EGR Cooler Replacement campaign. He/she organizes and communicates all the details of projects to team members and dealers. Coordinate with central department and provide regular updates. Cooperate with BMW Parts Dept. to update number of necessary parts in stock and works with Technical Service Dept. to determine parts management scheme for dealers ordering. Communicate required action decided by BMW to dealers for campaign proceeding guideline according to market situation and parts availability. Weekly follow up dealer for customer scheduling visit of Priority VIN together with monthly summary. Monitoring the daily progress of projects. Providing detailed updates to project managers or other stakeholders. Organizing reports, invoices, and budgets. Planning meetings and organizing project logistics. Coordinate with internal and external parties for the flawless execution of the project. Report and escalate to upper management as and when needed. Create and maintain a comprehensive project documentation. Qualifications: Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills are essential to work closely with team members and managers, and effectively manage problems as they occur. Leadership: As the primary point of contact for team members, you must be able to provide guidance, feedback, and encouragement for achieving goals. Organization and time management: Managing the daily activities and needs of an entire team requires an excellent ability to multitask and effectively manage your time. Computers and data entry: Budgets and other important documents for companies are usually created on computers and sometimes maintained in databases. Problem-solving: Although project managers may step in to handle significant problems, you should be prepared to work through and resolve minor issues without assistance. Positive attitude: Generally, a positive outlook makes it easier to handle the stress of unexpected challenges and also helps the entire team stay positive and motivated.

Job_Title: Coordinator and Administrator (New grad is welcome) - Good English

Job_Title: Executive Assistant
Job_Description: DHL eCommerce Thailand is a quality leader in Express Domestic Delivery business in Thailand.    We are a subsidiary of DHL Group, the largest logistics company in the world. Our company focuses on building a long-term sustainable business which offers growth and development opportunities for our employees. Connecting people, improving lives is at the center of what we do every day. We are seeking a passionate and dedicated Executive Assistant with proactive and can-do attitude to provide high-level managerial as well as administrative support to our top executive. Roles and Responsibilities: Act as a liaison between the CEO and various internal and external stakeholders. Gather information, conduct research, analyze business information and summarize insight to help CEO in making sound business decision. Maintain business performance and management report on monthly and on adhoc basis. Participate in Senior Management Meeting. Summarize key discussion points, agreed action plans and follow-up on outstanding tasks to ensure proper execution. Coordinate and work closely with Senior Management Team. Handle confidential information with discretion and professionalism, maintaining the highest level of confidentiality. Manage the CEO's time, priorities, travel arrangement and itinerary, ensuring optimal time allocation and coordination. Prepare, edit correspondences, communications, presentations for internal and external audiences. Assist in organizing company events, conferences, and meetings, both virtual and in-person. Assist the executive in handing special projects or initiatives and assuming project leadership role when required. Provide general administrative support to the CEO. Qualification: Proven experience as an Executive Assistant or similar role. Fluent in written and spoken English and Thai. Discretion and confidentiality are paramount. Strong communication and interpersonal abilities. Exceptional organizational skills with attention to detail. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel and PowerPoint) and other relevant tool/technology and business communication software. Ability to handle multiple tasks and prioritize in a fast-paced environment. Excellent adaptability and problem-solving skill. Take initiatives. Polished, mature and professional appearance, demeanor and communication style. Work Location: GPF Tower, Wireless Road, Bangkok

Job_Title: Operations Manager (Coffee business) 80-120K
Job_Description: Position: Operations Manager (Coffee business) 80-120K Based: Bangkok Contact Recruiter: Boonyapa ( 086-378-4087 ): Boonyapa(@)mriww.co.th Our client is the one stop beverage solution leader in the business with more than 15 years of experience including manufacturing, exporting, and distributing the products. The company not only emphasize on the product quality but also the after-sales services and mechanical maintenance by experienced technicians. Responsibilities Taking a proactive approach to identify and analyze business issues, opportunities, risks, and constraints. Developing functional plans that align optimally with corporate strategies and goals. Collaborating with and engaging all stakeholders to realize desired results, ensuring the protection of company and customer assets while minimizing risks. Actively participating in the implementation or Business Review with existing or new customers to deliver Operational Excellence assurance and drive business growth and success. Continuously identify service gaps, provide recommendations, and implement solutions to enhance customer satisfaction. Engaging local vendors, suppliers, and stakeholders to seek solutions and add value to customers. Ensuring the periodic evaluation of Business Continuity Plans for effectiveness. Developing and driving company programs for existing and new customers to grow revenue and customer margin. Developing and managing processes and metrics to ensure optimal organizational service and financial performance. Ensuring organizational commitment and compliance to company processes and procedures to maximize efficiencies and protect the company’s assets and reputation, including safety. Conducting periodic reviews of productivity, headcount, G&A budgets, competitor benchmarking, and relevant KPIs. Establishing annual budgets and ensuring the achievement of financial and business objectives and goals across the teams. Effectively managing budgets, taking appropriate actions to control and reduce costs and optimize investments. Upholding and enforcing the company’s financial standards and policies, supporting programs and initiatives to stimulate and enhance revenue opportunities. Performing to the highest ethical and professional standards, driving cross-functional collaboration for corporate results. Ensuring that the teams have the competencies, capabilities, and tools to consistently deliver on goals and objectives. Qualifications/Requirements Thai nationally only. Bachelor’s degree or higher in Business Administration, Statistics or Finance and Economics. 5-8 years of extensive experience in business management with proven track record in senior operations management, preferably overseeing multiple branches or locations. Demonstrated ability to lead and manage teams across geographically dispersed branches. Strong financial management skills, including budgeting, and financial analysis. Strategic mindset with the ability to develop and implement operational strategies that align with organizational objectives. Experience driving change, fostering innovation, and adapting operations to evolving business needs. Good in writing and speaking English. Attractive salary and generous fringe benefits will be offered to the successful candidates. Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details and refer the position To  boonyapa(@)mriww.co.th If you believe that you are the right one, Call Boonyapa"NOW" 086-378-4087

Job_Title: Customer Conversion & E-Commerce Operations (Buddy Fresh - Pet Service)
Job_Description: Join our dynamic team at Buddy Fresh , a personalized and DIY pet service operating under Betagro group. We are looking for individuals with a positive attitude, strong problem-solving skills, and a passion for providing exceptional service. In this role, you will be responsible for managing customer inquiries, order processing, and contributing to the overall operational success of our startup. Responsibilities: Under Customer Interaction (Sales - 70%) ·        Represent the Buddy Fresh brand voice to our current and prospective customers being the frontline contact for customer inquiries and relationship management across multiple platforms (social media, phones, order management systems, etc.) ·        Deliver a memorable customer experience that helps to build long-term relationships with our pups and their pet parents. ·        Accurately track and monitor customer feedback and interactions and use that information to improve the website and overall customer experience. ·        Help drive initiatives to accomplish our CX Vision of creating a world-class genuinely kind customer experience. ·        Contact customers through phone calls (outbound) to sell the product to potential customers who have left their details on the web. ·        Coordinate with the operations team for order fulfillment and issue resolution, overseeing the order management system. Under Operations (Ordering & Documents - 30%) ·        Act as the link between customers and the kitchen, managing customer orders and coordinating order fulfillment for timely deliveries. Collaborate with the kitchen team to ensure accurate sales forecasting and product availability. ·        Work closely with logistics partners and carriers to optimize transportation and delivery processes, ensuring on-time and high-quality deliveries. ·        Handle returns, exchanges, and refund requests to maintain a seamless customer experience while ensuring timely and quality order deliveries. ·        Assist the team in various operational tasks, including data analysis and continuous process improvement initiatives. ·        Collaborate cross-functionally with other departments such as IT, Finance, and Administration to support overall company objectives. Qualifications ·        English and Thai speaker. ·        Commercial attitude. ·        Responsible, communicative, and decisive person. ·        Empathy with customers ·        Previous experience in customer service, operations, or related fields is preferred. ·        Strong problem-solving abilities and a proactive approach to finding solutions, can-do attitude. ·        Positive attitude, adaptability, and willingness to work in a startup environment. ·        Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to build positive relationships with customers and stakeholders. ·        Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and quality in all aspects of work. ·        Ability to prioritize tasks and handle multiple responsibilities effectively. ·        Passion for pets and dedication to delivering exceptional service. For more information, please visit our website at buddyfreshnow.com

Job_Title: Head of People and Workplace
Job_Description: Responsible for handling the entire HR Operations process, including planning, overseeing, and supporting hiring, making contracts, onboarding, providing benefits, evaluating, payroll, and exiting of ooca personnel. You will collaborate with a company secretary to achieve goals as we scale from a 15-person company to a 30-person company. Working with the CEO and other management levels to spearhead and drive the people strategy in line with the business strategy. Managing HR Ops SOP improvement and systems implementation for efficient and effective processes. Dealing with employment relations issues such as grievances and employee welfare. Driving employee engagement programs to retain the best talent and ensure high employee satisfaction. Responsible for building ooca culture in accordance with the company's staple. Updating and maintaining HR-related information, such as training records, leave applications, and controlling general documentation forms to comply with the Personnel system. Providing full administrative and workplace support activities related to operations and personnel. Assisting the team in internal collaboration, including managing schedules and keeping track of internal work records. Supporting local purchases and coordinating the purchase of multiple division’s standardized supplies, materials, and equipment; maintaining an accurate list; receiving, checking, and stocking supplies. Managing, regulating, and maintaining ooca's collaborative work stacks and access to tools such as Notion, Google Workspace, Discord Server, and other social media accounts requires comfort and efficiency. You must be able to use these tools effectively. Others as assigned. Requirements: Degree in Business Management/Psychology/Humanity field related to human resource management. At least five years of experience in human resources is required. Good command of Thai in writing, reading, listening, and speaking is essential since Ooca's headquarters is located in Bangkok, Thailand, and the majority of its employees are Thai. Good command of English in writing, reading, listening, and speaking is essential, as Ooca is a start-up company with international workforce. Based in Bangkok, Thailand, our company is a hybrid of online and offline operations. You should be able to come into the office when necessary, setting a good example and fostering a positive culture within the team. Knowledge of HR functions is essential for any organization. This includes recruitment, pay and benefits, training and development, and more. Having expertise in these areas helps ensure that employees are hired, retained, and developed to their fullest potential. Knowledge of legal HR-related issues and documents is essential for any HR professional. It is important to stay up-to-date on the latest regulations and laws that affect the workplace. Having a thorough understanding of the applicable laws and regulations can help HR professionals make informed decisions and ensure compliance. Passionate about technology, startups, disruptive models, organizational culture, and talent management Passionate about our mission and people, and keen to learn and develop best practices for people management community building. Pleasant with good coordination and interpersonal skills Takes ownership and accountability for problem-solving. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal A commitment to the highest professional ethical standards The ability to work in a fast-paced, culturally diverse environment and prioritize among competing tasks/errands. A view towards long-term planning and scaling the organization. The willingness to challenge and debate issues of importance to our company. Proficiency with Google Workspace and other tech tools like Notions and Discord

Job_Title: Receptionist/พนักงานต้อนรับ
Job_Description: Position Receptionist (Junior Level) Starting Date ASAP Report To -    Head of Marketing & Admissions Department Administration Office General Description This role serves as the first point of contact for students, families, and visitors upon entering the school premises. As a member of the front office team, your responsibilities primarily involve communication. Thus, you should possess familiarity with proper phone and email etiquette, as well as strong interpersonal skills. Your daily tasks will encompass maintaining records, handling phone calls, and facilitating communication between teachers, staff, and families. In some instances, you may need to explain academic programs and address inquiries related to applications, enrollment, courses, and financial aid. Furthermore, you'll be responsible for recording all documents pertaining to the admission process, following up with applicants to update statuses, and addressing any new inquiries. Additionally, you will conduct tours and provide general information sessions about the campus. Position Details and Responsibilities General Duties ●    Answer phone calls in a pleasant and informative manner, aiming to provide information and create a positive impression of the school. ●    Greet all incoming students, families, and guests with respect and professionalism. ●    Provide comprehensive information to potential students and their parents regarding the school's philosophy and mission statement throughout all school activities. ●    Foster a positive, welcoming, and caring atmosphere within the Front Office. ●    Effectively perform any other duties assigned by the Principal. ●    Attend to children's personal needs, including attending to those who are sick or injured, and maintain attendance records for latecomers. ●    Demonstrate the ability to work cooperatively as part of a team and assist other office staff as needed. ●    Attends the school training, seminar, activities, and meetings. ●    Performs other duties as assigned and related. Transportation ●    Coordinate with transportation services as needed. ●    Organize transportation for students using school van drivers. ●    Provide residence information to school van drivers. ●    Maintain current student transportation data by monthly updates for the cashier. ●    Facilitate introductions between students, parents, and van drivers. ●    Ensure that transportation services are safe and punctual: Qualifications and Attributes ●    Bachelor's degree in any related field. ●    Ability to coordinate and work multitask with the mind of positive and service. ●    Child’s protection and safety training if preferred. ●    Good of command of English and Thai in reading, writing, and speaking. ●    Flexible and cooperative with school activities and events. ●    Good interpersonal skills and ability to deal professionally with issues. ●    High level of confidentiality and integrity. ●    Good in using Google Suite, IT Tools and Applications, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint). ●    Excellent customer service skills and a friendly, professional demeanor. ●    Familiarity with proper phone and email etiquette. Benefit ●    5 working days ●    Provident Fund ●    Social Security Fund ●    Christmas/New Year and Songkran Break Contact us https://www.niva.ac.th/careers [link removed]

Job_Title: Administrative Assistant Manager/ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการห้างหุ้นส่วน/ธุรการ
Company: MED SOLUTION AND SERVICES LIMITED PARTNERSHIP
Job_Description: รายละเอียดงาน จัดเตรียมเอกสารและประสานงาน กับหน่วยงานต่างๆ ทั้งภายใน และภายนอกองค์กร หากพบปัญหาใดให้แจ้งอย่างรวดเร็ว ดูแลรับผิดชอบในงานให้เป็นระเบียบเรียบร้อยตามมาตราฐาน วางแผนและดูแลการเพิ่มรายได้ใ้นสาขาให้เป็นไปตามเป้าหมาย - บริหารจัดการภายในบริษัทให้เป็นไปตามมาตรฐานการปฏิบัติงาน - บริหารจัดการระบบการทำงานภายในบริษัทให้มีประสิทธิภาพ งานอื่นๆ เพิ่มเติมตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร จบการศึกษา ปวศ - ปริญญาตรีในสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ในงานบริหารบุคคลระดับหัวหน้างานขึ้นไปไม่ต่ำกว่า 2 ปี พิจารณา สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ระดับปานกลาง แก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี มีความกระตือรืนล้นในการทำงาน มีระเบียบวินัยและความรับผิดชอบสูง มีความละเอียด รอบคอบ ช่างสังเกตุ มีความคิดริเริมสร้างสรรค์ มนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี ซื่อสัตย์ เป็นคนดี และรักษาความลับได้เป็นอย่างดี จริงใจต่องานในหน้าที่ ตั้งใจทำงาน และรักในงานที่ทำ ไม่เกี่ยงงาน มีความรู้ด้านกฏหมายแรงงานเป็นอย่างดี ขับรถยนต์ได้ และมีใบขับขี่ เดินทางมาทำงานเองได้ สวัสดิการ ค่ารักษาพยาบาล เงินช่วยเหลือบุตร โบนัส, ปรับเงินเดือน วันลาพักร้อน, วันหยุดประจำปี ยูนิฟอร์ม งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ เงินช่วยเหลือต่าง ๆ ห้างหุ้นส่วนจำกัด เมด โซลูชันแอนด์เซอร์วิสเซส 140 หมู่ที่ 6 ตำบลป่าชัน อำเภอพลับพลาชัย จ.บุรีรัมย์ 31250

Job_Title: Corporate Secretary/เลขาบริษัท
Job_Description: Job description and responsibilities - Prepare all documents and draft mails of Top management; Managing the meetings, events and agenda of Top management; Travel with Directors or independently in mainland of China, HK, or other asean countries to negotiate with related organizations or deal with the personal affairs of Directors; Other tasks assigned by Top management. Qualification- Master degree in related field; 5-10 years of working experience in secretary, sales, marketing or finance; Can speak 3 languages (Thai, English and Chinese) in communication level, can speak Cartonese will be priority. Ready for over time tasks and sudden business trips.

Job_Title: HRS Specialist (Fixed term 6 months)
Job_Description: Job Responsibilities: Responsible for managing end to end recruitment process from sourcing to onboarding and support international assignment services administration. Required qualifications: Bachelor's degree 3 years and above in recruitment functions or HR area. Good command of English-speaking and writing. Benefits & Others: Five-day work week Work from home

Job_Title: Assistant Accounting Manager and Administrator/ธุรการบัญชี admin
Job_Description: Urgently Required. Can start work immediately. Job Responsibilities Self-motivated and able to work independently under pressure. Data entry correctly, prepare lease agreements, documents filing. Booking AP, AR, and accounting related items into accounting systems. Record loan and interest information, support payments, prepare data, scan documents. Manage Work Order for staffs and vendors. And other assigned administrative tasks as needed, such as, draft agreements, tenants tracking and related paperworks. Qualification Accounting work experience and knowledge required. Understand Express Accounting software. Some Communicates in English (in reading and writing) Responsible person, multi-task, service minded, easy to work with as a team Bachelor Degree in Accounting major is a plus 3 to 6 years of experience

Job_Title: HR Account Specialist / HR Services Specialist
Job_Description: Do you dream of working in a company that is driven by a meaningful purpose? An inclusive company that empowers you to do your best and be innovative? We are looking for HR Account Specialist to make a difference! At Schneider Electric , we believe access to energy and digital is a basic human right. We empower all to do more with less, ensuring Life Is On everywhere, for everyone, at every moment. We provide energy and automation digital solutions for efficiency and sustainability. What you will do: Being the focal point of contact for payroll, compensation & benefits, and expat services Partnering closely with HR business partner to provide end to end delivery of HR services Communicating HR initiatives and ensuring implementation Preparing the monthly payroll, conducting necessary processes, and ensuring correct payment of salary, overtime, and other allowances in accordance with legal requirements and internal procedures. Being responsible for payment of legal charges, social security, income tax, labor dues, etc. Coordinating day-to-day administration of compensation and benefits programs as well as learning service Provide support and problem solution regarding HR issues Experience and skills, we are looking for: Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience in payroll, HR compensation and benefits. Experience in expats services is a plus Good problem solving, project management and computer skills Excellent interpersonal and written communication skills Good command of written and spoken in English Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced, team environment Motivated and driven personality Higher skills in PC Software Literacy:  Words, Excel, Power point Experience in MNCs company and dealing with multi country stakeholders is advantage. Benefits we offer: Global family leave Fixed plus Variable bonus Flexible benefits pay Comprehensive medical coverage for employee and dependents Worldwide Employee Stock Ownership …and more! We are looking forward to welcoming you in our team!

Job_Title: Talent Acquisition Specialist
Job_Description: Overall values: Passionate in Aura. Strong passion in bringing a high-quality medical service to everyone at a reasonable price. Always stay in a fast-paced, revenue-driven work environment. Always analyze and optimize on-the-go. We are bringing the aesthetic industry towards a new break through, there will be many obstacles. Persevere through all of them. We value high-growth employees and reward them handsomely. Evaluate and give constructive feedback your team to support high-growth career path. Excellent presentation skill with strong logical thinking. Excellent management skill. Always plan ahead. Always have backup plan. Strong can-do attitude. Always strive only for the best. Always go beyond expectation. Always set an almost impossible goal. Never settle for an easy one. Purpose of the position: We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Talent Acquisition Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for sourcing, attracting, and hiring top-tier talent to meet the staffing needs of our organization. The Talent Acquisition Specialist will play a key role in building a talented and diverse workforce, collaborating with hiring managers, and ensuring a positive candidate experience throughout the recruitment process. Key Responsibilities: Manage the end-to-end recruitment process, from job posting and candidate sourcing to offer negotiation, hiring and onboarding. Designing and implementing the overall recruiting strategy. Conduct manpower survey and request from management level. Screening candidates by reviewing resumes and job applications, and performing phone screenings. Negotiate salary package, company benefits and other working conditions. Maintain Aura standard for premium experience to candidate. Keep tracking hiring metrics and report to management level. Additional ad-hoc duties may be required to support other roles within the People team ( activity, training, outing, annual meeting). To succeed in this role, you need to have: Bachelor's degree in any field. Proven experience as a Talent Acquisition or similar role. Strong knowledge of recruitment best practices, employment laws, and industry trends. Good written and verbal communication skills in English. Computer Literacy (MsOffice365). Passionate in beauty industry. Problem-solving skill to proactively find solutions. Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment. Life at Aura Semi-flexible Office hour: 9.30-18.30 Smart Casual Dress Code 2-min walk from BTS Chongnonsi (Sathon) Positive-energetic teammates Free lunch Unlimited snacks and drinks Annual vaccination Premium Health and Life insurance High yield, high pop up Provident Fund plan Child Education Benefits Clinic service for free or at great cost Extra Benefits to keep your Professional Look and Feel Fit Special member price with Fitness first and Virgin Active Thailand Entertainment zone; Nintendo switch, PS, Board games etc. Shower room with hotel amenities Luxury massage chair to keep office syndrome away Sleep box, take a rest and get up with fresher energy and much more! Explore us at IG: life.at.aura

Job_Title: Team Assistant (New Business)
Job_Description: Responsibilities Organize and maintain files and databases in a confidential manner Manage communication including emails and phone and conference calls Screen phone calls, redirect calls, and take messages Schedule appointments, meetings, and reservations as needed Ensure meetings are effectively organized and minute Handle confidential documents ensuring they remain secure Conduct research and create presentations or reports as needed Other tasks as assigned Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or equivalent 3-4 years of secretarial, or office administrator experience Proficient computer skills, including Microsoft Office Excellent written and verbal communication skills both Thai and English Excellent time management skills and ability to multi-task and prioritize work Attention to detail and problem-solving skills

Job_Title: Officer : Corporate Secretary
Job_Description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ งานด้านการบริหารจัดการประชุมคณะอนุกรรมการบริษัทฯ จัดทำและจัดเก็บรายงานการประชุมคณะอนุกรรมการบริษัทฯ งานด้านการบริหารจัดการประชุมคณะกรรมการบริษัทฯ จัดทำและจัดเก็บรายงานการประชุมคณะกรรมการบริษัทฯ งานด้านการบริหารจัดการประชุมสามัญผู้ถือหุ้น ประสานงานและจัดทำเอกสารต่าง ๆ เพื่อจัดการประชุมสามัญผู้ถือหุ้น ประจำปี การแจ้งข้อมูล/รายงานต่อตลาดหลักทรัพย์และสำนักงานคณะกรรมการกำกับหลักทรัพย์และตลาดหลักทรัพย์ งานด้านการสนับสนุนคณะกรรมการบริษัท งานด้านการจัดทำบันทึกการขออนุมัติเพื่อเสนอประธานเจ้าหน้าที่บริหารอนุมัติ งานด้านการจัดซื้อของขวัญปีใหม่ของบริษัท งานด้านการแต่งตั้งผู้รักษาการแทน CEO คุณสมบัติ วุฒิการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี ไม่จำกัดสาขา มีความรู้ด้านกฏหมายที่เกี่ยวข้องกับบริษัทจดทะเบียน การบริหารจัดการ รวมถึง ความรู้ความเข้าใจธุรกิจบัตรเครดิต มีทักษะด้านการเจรจาต่อรอง ไหวพริบ การวางแผนและการติดตามงาน รวมถึง การให้คำปรึกษาแนะนำแก้ไขปัญหาต่าง ๆ มีความละเอียดรอบคอบ การรักษาความลับ มีทัศนคติด้านบวก รวมถึง มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี มีทักษะด้านภาษาอังกฤษ ฟัง พูด อ่าน เขียน ในระดับดี มีทักษะด้านการใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ โปรแกรม Microsoft Office ได้ดี

Job_Title: Assistant Manager - Recruitment/ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการ - งานสรรหาว่าจ้างบุคลากร
Company: บริษัท เดอะ แพลทินัม กรุ๊ป จำกัด (มหาชน)
Job_Description: Job summary: Performing all recruitment processes i.e. writes and places job advertisement in various media, searching, screening resumes, inviting candidates for interview, interviewing candidates and liaising with the line managers and also managing other relevant tasks to deliver smooth recruitment processes Update and control the organization chart and manpower as approved Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree or higher in any related fields At least 7 years of working experience in recruitment function Experience in retail business, shopping mall, real estate is advantage Highly responsible and positive thinking Able to work independently and able to work under pressure Good team player

Job_Title: Human Resources Business Partner (HRBP)
Job_Description: We are a global leader in the fast fashion retailing industry (includes : ZARA, ZARA HOME, Massimo Dutti, Bershka, OYSHO, Pull& Bear ) and we are now seeking a Human Resources Business Partner (HRBP) to join our team as a Manager, to work closely with senior management stakeholders to provide professional support and advice across all Human Resources functions. Job Responsibilities: Responsible for manpower planning, recruitment, employee training and development 90% work in retail shop and work closely with operation team, Brand Manager, Store Manager and Human Resources team to ensure that HR and Operation systems are implemented in Thailand. Prepare and ensure timely submission report to Regional HR Director. Provide consultation and work closely with line managers to support their HR need, solve staff problem as well as handle disciplinary action Ensure effective communication to all staff levels Analyze training need and conduct training as required by Head office Identify key talents, and work with management and L&D team on their development and retention Based on business needs, work with Senior Management stakeholders on organization design and manpower planning Conduct daily store visits to establish rapport with front-line business and gain insight into working atmosphere, spotting any labor issue risks. Qualifications: Bachelor degree or higher in Human Resources or other related field Good command in written and spoken English Excellent communication skill Can travel to visit all branches in Bangkok Experience in HR operation would be a plus Posses “can do” attitude, entrepreneurial spirit, practical creativity, strong determination and commitment to deliver results Experience in a retail business environment is an advantage

Job_Title: Nurse & Administrative Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่ฝ่ายพยาบาลและธุรการ
Job_Description: Bachelor Degree in Nursing / Health Public or PN Good command in English Start as soon as possible The International School of Samui is totally committed to safeguarding the welfare of children and young people and expects the same from its employees. All new staff will be subject to enhanced pre-employment clearance, including identity checks, criminal background checks, qualification checks, and employment checks to include an exploration of any gaps in employment and at least satisfactory professional references which will be verified.

Job_Title: HR & Admin Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่ฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคลและธุรการอาวุโส
Job_Description: Role Description: This position reports directly to HR and Admin Manager in HQ. As HR and Admin Executive, they should be highly enthusiastic in people management, relatively resourceful and flexible in problem tackling. Ability to speak and read English is mandatory as this position requires to liaise closely with members in Malaysia. Job Responsibilities: To assume full spectrum of HR functions including recruitment, payroll administration, training & development and compensation & benefits To implement and coordinate HR strategies and initiatives in line with the Organization's policy To execute and continually review Company's HR Policy, SOPs and Employee Handbook in compliance with relevant laws and regulations. To liaise with government statutory bodies for legal and administration requirements To support in the handling of disciplinary issues, complaints, grievance in accordance to Company policies and rules Any other tasks as and when assigned by Management or direct superior Job Requirements: Possesses Certificate/Diploma/Degree in Human Resources Management or any equivalent qualifications. At least 1 year of working experiences in HR department, knowledge in Labor Protection Act BE 2541 is mandatory Well conversed in spoken and written English , and Thai Positive attitude and ability to perform under pressure with minimal supervision Result-oriented and ability to attend to details Benefit Package: Food + Transport Allowances Diligent Allowance Medical + Insurance Coverage

Job_Title: Urgent - Administrative Officer (Part-time/Contract/Internship)/พนักงานธุรการ...
Job_Description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ: ดูแลการจัดการเอกสารทั้งกระบวนการเริ่มต้นจัดระเบียบเอกสาร การเก็บรักษา กำหนดระยะเวลาการเก็บรอเอกสารไว้ การเรียกเอกสารกลับมาใช้อีก จนถึงรวบรวมข้อมูลเอกสารเพื่อทำลายเมื่อถึงกำหนด จัดเรียงเอกสารให้เป็นระบบ และดูแลรักษาเอกสารให้อยู่ในสภาพที่พร้อมใช้งานได้ตลอดเวลา เก็บรวบรวมเอกสารให้เป็นหมวดหมู่ พร้อมทั้งตรวจสอบความครบถ้วน ในการเก็บเข้าแฟ้ม (filing) ให้บริการแก่ผู้ที่มีความประสงค์จะขอใช้เอกสารได้เป็นอย่างดีสรุปค่าใช้จ่ายในกระบวนการที่เกี่ยวข้อง และประเมินผลการจัดเก็บเอกสาร หน้าที่อื่น ๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ : การศึกษาระดับประกาศนียบัตรวิชาชีพชั้นสูง ( ปวส.) มีความรู้ภาษาอังกฤษ และสามารถใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ได้เป็นอย่างดี โปรแกรม Excel, Microsoft office เป็นผู้มีความระเอียด รอบคอบ มีความรับผิดชอบ มีระเบียบวินัยและตรงต่อเวลา มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์และสามารถทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้ เก็บความลับในหน้าที่การงานอย่างเคร่งครัด

Job_Title: Personal Assistant/ผู้ช่วยผู้บริหาร
Job_Description: Role and Responsibilities: Managing calendars, meeting schedules, reminders Attending the meetings. Creating meeting minutes. Reminding the relevant parties before a meeting, and performing a post-meeting reminders. Providing a support to the projects' supervisors Providing support in document management. Assist the supervisors in addressing team members' concerns. Assisting the travel arrangements Arranging a transportation and accommodation . Financial management Performing expense claims . Preparing the report of expenses. Record keeping of relevant receipts. Mandatory Qualifications : Bachelor's degree or higher. Final-year interns (acceptable). Have attention to detail. Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities. Have computer and Information-searching skills. Good skills in Microsoft Office. Proficient in English (Key skills: Speaking, Reading, and Writing) Speaking English fluently will receive special consideration by the management. Talking with colleagues in workplace in English for a whole peroid of day in office. Desired Candidate Qualities: Willing to learn under pressure. Flexible working hours. Ambitious and strive for career advancement. Positive attitude. On-the-job training. Personal Assistant At Chelson Gordon Consultancy (CG), we foster a culture of collaboration and teamwork. As a Personal Assistant, you will be facing diverse challenges daily. You will manage schedules, coordinate meetings and events, handle correspondence, and assist with various administrative tasks. This role will help you grow over time to unleash the best potentials. Employee’s additional benefits Professional development activities. Opportunities to travelling abroad. Insurance. Excellence performance Bonus. Staff entertainment (e.g., food allowance, gaming activities) Work Place Location: 27th Floor, RS Tower 121/81 Ratchadapisek Rd, Dindaeng, Dindaeng, Bangkok, 10400.

Job_Title: Accounting Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่บัญชี
Job_Description: We are looking for Accounting Officer to be responsible for handling clerical tasks in our office and helping manager following by the ordered. Friendly, actively, sincerely, flexible, good attitude, cheerful and confident. Job Responsibilities: Prepare asset, liability, and capital account entries by compiling and analyzing account information Monitor the system to account bank reconciliation for daily and monthly financial transactions Entry data all daily journal transaction in Excel Maintain orderly historical records by kept documents in folder/drive Strong understanding of basic accounting principles Liaise with local auditors, banks, government Be responsible with Withholding Tax, Local Business Tax, SEC data reports Provide ad-hoc, clerical and administrative support to management, as requested Prepare Tax reporting (Purchase Tax report and Sale Tax report) Tax filing on revenue department and payment for every month such as PP.30, PND.1, PND.3, PND.53, PND.50, PND.51, PP.36, PND.54 Prepare Payment Voucher report and Petty Cash report Able to do for AR, AP, Casheir, Payroll and Ledger account Job Requirements: Candidate must have a Bachelor degree or higer equivalent in the related field. 2-5 years of work experience in accounting and finance-related fields. Basic spoken and written in English and Thai. Experience with Microsoft Office/Accounting System. Excellent organizational and time management abilities. Comprehensive knowledge of bookkeeping procedures. Strong understanding of accounting regulations. Has an excellent data entry skill with attention to details and thoroughness. Able to prepare financial reports by collecting, analyzing and summarizing account information and trends. Reporting Skills, Attention to Detail, Deadline-Oriented, ability to mainatain a high level of accuracy in performing all essential duites. Be able to work under tight timeline and diversity of people. Effective oral and written communication skills. Good attitude and resilient. Able to work independently. Service mind, positive attitude with enthusiastic, diligent, honest, carefully, hight responsiblilities, adaptablility, flexibility, communication skill, creative thinking, complex problem solving, time management, leadership, emotional intelligence, critical thinking, teamwork and colaboration. ***English Resume is needed.***

Job_Title: Personal Assistant to CEO
Job_Description: Responsibilities Manage executive calendars to accurately assess availability Process executive communications and correspondence for key updates and inquiries Assist with special projects as required i.e. HR tasks, data collection & analysis Arrange travel and accommodations for executives. Communicate in office with all levels of staff to ensure coordination. Any other assignments Skills and qualifications Excellent verbal and written communications skills Ability to handle multiple tasks while properly prioritizing urgent and high-impact work Ability to think proactively and show initiative Ability to exercise discretion with sensitive information, including client and employee data

Company: PERSOLKELLY HR Services Recruitment (Thailand) Co., Ltd.

Job_Title: Receptionist | พนักงานเคาน์เตอร์เวชระเบียน/ให้ข้อมูลเกี่ยวกับการบริการของคลินิก
Job_Description: รายละเอียดงาน ให้ข้อมูลเกี่ยวกับการบริการของคลินิก บริการ แจ้งเตือน ทำนัดหมาย เลื่อนนัด คนไข้ไม่ให้ตกหล่น ให้ข้อมูลการเดินทางมายังคลินิก ให้ข้อมูลเรื่องค่าตรวจรักษา และขั้นตอยการรักษาของคลินิก ให้ข้อมูลเรื่องทั่วไป ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการรักษาของคลินิก ให้บริการต้อนรับผู้รับบริการบริเวณด้านหน้า จัดทำบันทึกสถิติการปฏิบัติงานทุกครั้ง ตรวจสอบการลงตรวจของทันตแพทย์ทุกวัน ให้บริการด้านข้อมูล ตอบคำถามทางโทรศัพท์ คุณสมบัติ เพศ : หญิง อายุ : 18 ปีขึ้นไป วุฒิ ปวช. ปวส. ปริญญาตรี มีใจรักงานบริการ ยิ้มแย้มแจ่มใส ขยัน ซื่อสัตย์ ตรงต่อเวลา พร้อมเรียนรู้งาน สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ และมีทัศนคติที่ดี เงินเดือนและสวัสดิการ เงินเดือนเริ่มต้น 15,000 - 20,000 บาท/เดือน (ขึ้นอยู่กับประสบการณ์) ค่าทำงานล่วงเวลา OT ไม่ขาด ลา มาสาย มีเบี้ยขยัน 500 บาท/เดือน หลังการทดลองงาน หรือ ผ่านการสอบเลื่อนตำแหน่ง มีการปรับฐานเงินเดือนขึ้นตามลำดับ โบนัส และ เงินพิเศษตามผลประกอบการ (Incentive 1,000-5,000 บาท/เดือน) วันหยุดประจำปี 13 วัน ลาพักร้อน 6 วัน/ปี มีประกันสังคมหลังผ่านการทดลองงาน ค่ารักษาพยาบาล 3,000 บาท/ปี ส่งอบรมประจำปีตามความต้องการของตำแหน่ง มีกิจกรรมนอกสถานที่ งานเลี้ยงประจำปี (ปีใหม่) เวลาทำงาน ตามเวลาคลินิกเปิด แล้วแต่เคสในแต่ละวัน ( 8.00-18.00 น.โดยประมาณ ) ทำงาน 6 วัน/สัปดาห์ คลินิกหยุดทุกวันพุธ สถานที่ทำงาน Proud Smile Dental Clinic พราวสไมล์ เดนทัลคลินิก สาขาถนนสามัคคี สามารถเข้ามาทดลองงานกับเราก่อนได้ พร้อมได้รับค่าตอบแทนรายวัน สอบถามเพิ่มเติมติดต่อ Line : Mintalena2

Job_Title: Learning Experience Designer
Job_Description: Purpose of the Position The Learning Experience (LE) Designer is responsible for ideating, coordinating, and supporting Learning & Development activities with the Business Unit or function leads. LE designers play a critical role in the end-to-end learning process – learning needs identification, analysis, design, development, and transition to delivery and achieving the project's desired learning outcomes. Responsibilities 1. Identification of Learning Needs. Analyze business/service problems to evaluate the potential impact of learning experiences as a solution that aligns with the corporate’s goals. 2. Learner Analysis. Participate in functional and professional requirements to better understand learners' needs and context and synthesize the results into a summary and analysis document (input for the design workshop and shared with workshop participants). 3. Learning Experience Design. Organize and facilitate workshops to support the design of comprehensive and enduring learning experiences. Provide expertise and insights regarding learning innovation and analytics. Generate initial conceptual designs for learning experiences, leveraging established instructional theory in alignment with desired business outcomes. Utilize a wide array of resources, such as learning assets, knowledge management, certification, learning boards/collections, and social learning, to optimize the learning experience. Develop and implement prototyping and development strategies tailored to customers’ requirements and timelines. Ensure the quality, coherence, organization, and execution of learning designs, adhering to defined quality standards and desired business outcomes. Collaborate with the L&D team(s) in project kick-off meetings to comprehensively understand the client and project objectives. 4. Program Design & Iterative Development. Conduct a comprehensive assessment of learning designs to determine their ability to promote lasting learning outcomes. Determine the learning objectives for each learning experience component, aligning them with desired business outcomes, and ensure that the content appropriately matches the identified purposes. Foster high-quality, cohesive learning experiences across multiple asynchronous learning channels through iterative development and seamless transition to the delivery phase. Ensure robust governance practices are implemented to maintain quality standards within and across learning experiences. Collaborate with the Project Manager and customer’s requirements to devise adequate staffing and governance approaches. Work closely with the team to monitor the progress of the learning experience and cross-reference it to ensure a smooth transition to the delivery phase. Evaluate the quality of the learning experience(s) based on their ability to facilitate lasting learning outcomes and achieve desired business goals, establishing exit criteria for the transition to the delivery phase. 5. Transition to Delivery. Work with the related party to establish a transition schedule and activities in conjunction with the Strategic Delivery Planner. Contribute to and participate in project debrief reviews. Identify continuous improvement areas based on lessons learned; modify process steps as appropriate with input from the manager. 6. Relationship Management. Collaborate with team, peers, and Subject Matter Experts throughout the end-to-end learning process to ensure quality outcomes. Ensure risks and issues with timeline, scope, and budget are appropriately documented, reported, and mitigated. 7. Innovation and Analytics. Incorporate insights into learning experience designs. Identify potential learning analytics projects, innovation research opportunities, and learner data-gathering opportunities/research. Alongside the Learning Innovation Exchange team, help educate team members on the efficacy of new learning trends and be responsible for building out enablement materials for the efficient and effective implementation of those new trends. Job Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Organization Development, Human Resources Management or corporate communications or related field or experiences. At least 3 years experience in Training and Development, Training Roadmap and Internal Communications. Good interpersonal skills, creative thinking, self-motivated, result-driven, and service mind. Good computer skills in Microsoft Office (MS Excel, MS Word, MS PowerPoint, illustrator, and Photoshop) and multimedia programs. Able to communicate in English. Able to work well under pressure. Team players.

Job_Title: Admistration Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่ฝ่ายธุรการและประสานงานทั่วไป
Job_Description: ชื่อตำแหน่ง: เจ้าหน้าที่ฝ่ายธุรการและประสานงานทั่วไป ประเภทงาน: จัดทำและรวบรวมเอกสารสัญญา เอกสารด้านบัญชี และงานอื่นๆตามที่ได้มอบหมาย จากผู้บริหาร คุณวุฒิการศึกษา: การศึกษาปริญญาตรี คณะบริหารธุรกิจ สาขาการจัดการ การเงิน การบัญชี หรือคณะ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์การทำงาน : ประสบการณ์การทำงาน 1 – 3 ปี ขึ้นไป ระยะเวลาปฏิบัติงาน: จันทร์ - ศุกร์ ตั้งแต่เวลา 9.00 - 18.00 น. ขอบเขตการดำเนินงาน : จัดทำร่างสัญญาบริการ และตารางคุมงานบริการ จัดทำเอกสารบัญชีและภาษี ประสานงานกับฝ่ายบริหารและลูกค้า ทั้งภายในบริษัท และภายนอกบริษัท ประสานงานรับ-ส่งเอกสารกับสำนักงานบัญชีทุกเดือน งานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายเพิ่มเติมจากผู้บริหาร

Job_Title: Investor Relations Manager
Company: Sri Trang Agro - Industry Public Company Limited
Job_Description: Key Respoonsibolities Analyze/ prepare the company’s operating and financial results to SET/ shareholders / investors / rating agency Organize the company’s financial communication events including roadshows, analyst meetings, press releases/conferences and shareholder meetings Prepare the company’s Annual Report and Form 56-1 Prepare and maintain the effective investor/shareholder communication channels/tools including websites, newsletters, annual reports and social media. Manage day-to-day investor/analyst enquiries, provide inputs / feedbacks to the company’s management as well as handle crisis management Represent the company to maintain and manage long-term relationship with existing and potential domestic and international investors, research analysts, and financial media Act as the company’s spokesperson in communication with investment community. Job Specifications Bachelor or Master Degree in Finance, Marketing, Communications or related fields 5+ years of experience, preferably in investor relations, corporate finance, equity research analysts or investment banking Financial analysis Have knowledge about SEC & SET regulations Able to travel abroad and locally for the business trip
