Job_Title: Senior Commodity Manager, Contingent Workforce
Job_Description: Company Description At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible. At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon. We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future. Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too. We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands. Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data. Job Description The Contingent Workforce Senior Commodity Manager is responsible for developing the sourcing strategies for the Contingent Workforce Program Office. The person in this position would be recognized as a sourcing expert for global contingent workforce, would liaison with legal, act as Procurement ambassador to the business and integrate into the business to ensure a complete alignment and deep understanding of the business goals and partner in developing sourcing strategies. The goal is to be value-added sourcing partners to the business. This role involves developing and executing strategic initiatives to optimize the acquisition, deployment, and management of temporary, contract, and freelance personnel across various departments and functions.  The position involves developing negotiation strategies, advising requestors on contract terms and conditions, monitoring cost and scope of assigned contracts to assure compliance, best value and validate/improve pricing. ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Strategic Sourcing: Develop and implement a comprehensive sourcing strategy for contingent workforce categories, including temporary staff, contractors, freelancers, and consultants. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to understand their workforce needs, skill requirements, and project timelines. Identify and establish relationships with preferred staffing agencies, service providers, and online platforms for contingent talent acquisition. Negotiate terms, pricing, and contracts with staffing partners to ensure favorable rates and terms. Vendor Management: Monitor and evaluate the performance of staffing agencies and other contingent workforce suppliers. Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure supplier performance, including quality of talent, responsiveness, compliance, and cost-effectiveness. Conduct regular vendor reviews and provide feedback to improve service quality and address any issues. Compliance and Risk Management: Ensure compliance with relevant labor laws, regulations, and company policies for contingent workforce management. Mitigate risks associated with misclassification of workers, co-employment, and other legal and regulatory concerns. Collaborate with legal and HR departments to develop and maintain proper documentation and contracts for contingent workers. Demand Forecasting and Planning: Work closely with department managers and project leads to understand short-term and long-term workforce needs. Develop accurate demand forecasts for contingent labor across different functions and projects. Align workforce planning strategies with business objectives and project timelines. Cost Management: Analyze and manage the overall costs associated with contingent workforce utilization. Implement cost-saving initiatives, such as rate negotiations, volume discounts, and process efficiencies. Monitor and report on budget adherence, providing insights and recommendations for cost optimization. Technology and Automation: Stay current with technology trends and solutions related to contingent workforce management. Evaluate and implement technology platforms and tools that streamline the sourcing, onboarding, time tracking, and payment processes for contingent workers. Qualifications REQUIRED: Bachelor’s degree in supply chain management, logistics, or business administration or related field. At least 10 years of experience in indirect strategic sourcing with a multi-national organization with an emphasis on the management of temporary, contract, and freelance personnel procurement PREFERRED: Contract Negotiation / Vendor Mgmt. / Influencing skills required Experience and expertise with sourcing & contracting ERP tools (SAP and/or Oracle) Being able to speak in the Mandarin language would be an advantage SKILLS: Ability to work well in a fast-paced dynamic environment, handle multiple projects simultaneously, and ensure task completion and deadlines are met as required Demonstrated skills in negotiating and formulating technology contracts, understanding cost models and various price structures, management of contractual, IP, and labor law risks Strong project management, organizational, and analytical skills required Excellent team facilitation and presentation skills Proficient with Microsoft Office applications: Excel, Word, PowerPoint Good in English Communication Additional Information Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution. Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at jobs.accommodations@wdc.com to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.

Job_Title: Document Staff
Job_Description: บริษัทฯ เป็นผู้ผลิตชิ้นส่วนยานยนต์ ประเภท น๊อต สกรู บริษัทฯ มีสวัสดิการ รถรับ – ส่ง สาย (บางแสนหนองมน/ศรีราชา/พัทยา/เครือฯ/สะพานสี่/โปร่งสะเก็ต/ปลวกแดง/มาบยางพร/หัวกุญแจ(บึง)) อาหารกลางวัน ค่าเช่าบ้าน, เบี้ยขยันประจำเดือน, และเบี้ยขยันประจำปี, กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ, ประกันชีวิตกลุ่ม,โบนัส ,เงินขึ้นประจำปี และอื่น ๆ ต้องการบุคลากรที่มีความรู้ ความสามารถ มาร่วมงานด้วย ดังนี้ หญิง อายุ 25-30 ปี วุฒิการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี สาขาการจัดการ หรือ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ทำงานด้านธุรการ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ได้เป็นอย่างดี มีการติดต่อสื่อสารกับบุคคลรอบข้างได้ดี ได้รับการอบรม มาตรฐานคุณภาพยานยนต์ IATF16949, ISO14001 เชื่อฟังคำสั่งผู้บังคับบัญชา,มีการติดต่อสื่อสาร,มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ที่ดี,มีความรับผิดชอบต่อหน้าที่ สามารถทำงานล่วงเวลาได้ สนใจส่งใบสมัครมาได้ตามที่อยู่หรือติดต่อ : วิลาวรรณ  (ฝ่ายบุคคล) โทรศัพท์:(038)954523– 6  Mobile 081-9960014 E-Mail : personal2@asakawa.co.th

Job_Description: สถานที่ทำงาน : ศูนย์การค้า รอยัล การ์เด้น พล่าซ่า พัทยา, ชลบุรี - 20150 Thailand อัตราค่าจ้าง : ไม่ระบุ(เงินเดือน) พนักงานทำความสะอาดศูนย์การค้า(แม่บ้าน) ด่วน!! สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน ศูนย์การค้า  รอยัล  การ์เด้น  พล่าซ่า  พัทยา คุณสมบัติ -เพศ หญิง -สามารถเข้างานเป็นกะได้ -มีใจรักงานแม่บ้าน งานบริการ สวัสดิการ - ค่าอาหาร - ชุดยูนิฟอร์ม - อินเซนทีฟ - การปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี - ประกันสังคม/ประกันชีวิตและประกันสุขภาพหมู่ - ทุนการศึกษาสำหรับบุตร สนใจสามารถติดต่อสอบถามด้วยตัวเองที่แผนกทรัพยากรบุคคล หรือส่งเอกสารแนะนำตัวมายังอีเมลล์ pornsuda_bu@minor.com สอบถามข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ 038-710294 ถึง 8 ต่อ 345, 346 และ 444 เอกสารที่ต้องใช้ในการสมัครงาน ผู้สมัครทุกท่านที่สนใจสมัครงานในตำแหน่งงานใดๆ กับบริษัท กรุณาแนบเอกสารการสมัครงาน มีรายการดังนี้ คำแนะนำ โปรดเซ็นต์ชื่อรับรองสำเนาถูกต้องในเอกสารทุกใบ และเขียนกำกับว่าใช้ในการสมัครงานเท่านั้น 1. สำเนาบัตรประชาชน ทะเบียนบ้าน วุฒิการศึกษา ใบผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร (จำเป็นต้องนำไป) 2. รูปถ่าย แนะนำ 1 นิ้ว 2 รูป (จำเป็นต้องนำไปครับ) 3. สำเนาเอกสารราชการต่างๆ เช่น ใบเปลี่ยนชื่อ- สกุล / ใบผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร ฯ (ถ้ามี) 4. สำเนาหนังสือรับรองต่างๆ / สำเนาใบขับขี่ (ถ้างานนั้นเกี่ยวกับการขับรถ) 5. Slip เงินเดือนจากบริษัทปัจจุบัน หรือบริษัทสุดท้ายที่ท่านทำงาน (ถ้ามี) ระดับการศึกษา Qualification : ไม่จำกัดวุฒิ ขึ้นไป ติดต่อ Contact : ฝ่ายบุคคล รอยัลการ์เด้น พลาซ่า โทรศัพท์ Telephone : 038 710 294 – 8 ต่อ 345 และ 444 เว็บไซต์ Website : http://www.ripleysthailand.com รอยัลการ์เด้น พลาซ่า จำกัด ที่อยู่ที่ติดต่อ ศูนย์การค้า รอยัลการ์เด้นพลาซ่า 218 Moo 10, Beach Road, Nongprue, Banglamung, Chonburi - 20260 Thailand » (View)มีตำแหน่งว่าง 6 ตำแหน่งงาน ผู้รับสมัคร : ฝ่ายบุคคล รอยัลการ์เด้น พลาซ่า โทรศัพท์ : 038 710 294 – 8 ต่อ 345 และ 444 แฟกซ์ : 038-412-139 เว็บไซต์ : http://www.ripleysthailand.com ประเภทธกิจการ : ห้างสรรพสินค้า / ค้าปลีก-ส่ง / ร้านค้า บริษัท รอยัลการ์เด้นพลาซ่า จำกัด ซึ่งเป็นบริษัทฯในเครือของ The Minor Group ผู้บริหารธุรกิจชั้นนำในประเทศไทย ในกลุ่ม 3 ธุรกิจอันได้แก่ 1.The Minor Food Group : ธุรกิจด้านอาหารภายใต้แบรนด์ The Pizza Company , Sizzler , Burger King , Dairy Queen , Swenzen , The Coffe Club 2. Minor Corporation : ธุรกิจด้านแฟชั่น ไลฟ?สไตล์ ภายใต้แบรนด์ Gap , Bossini , Esprit , Tumi , Charles&Keith , Bloom, Red Earth , Smashbox, Laneige 3. Minor International : ธุรกิจโรงแรม สปา สันทนาการและการพักผ่อนภายใต้แบรนด์   Marriott , Anantara, St.Regis , Four Seasons , Royal Garden Plaza และ Ripley's โดยบริษัท รอยัลการ์เด้น พลาซ่า จำกัดดำเนินการธุรกิจศูนย์การค้าและธุรกิจบันเทิง ภายใต้ชื่อ ศูนย์การค้ารอยัล การ์เด้น พลาซ่า  มีสาขาดังนี้ พัทยา, กรุงเทพฯ และ เทอร์เทิล วิลเลจ ภูเก็ต นอกจากนี้ยังมี ธุรกิจด้านความบันเทิงสันทนาการภายใต้ชื่อ Ripley’s World of Entertainment

Job_Title: Associate Manager, Field Human Resources (HR)
Job_Description: Job Title: Associate Manager, Field HR Location: Bangkok, Thailand Department: Human Resources As the Associate Manager, Field HR, you are responsible for supporting the execution of Human Resources (HR) initiatives within Thailand. You will support the business by aligning with HR Operations, Centre of Excellence (COE), and HR Business Partners (HRBP) in all aspects of Human Resources, to deliver HR programs and initiatives across the organization. You will also support a wide range of HR functions which include employee relations, onboarding, talent management, leadership development, change management, diversity, performance management, workforce planning and compensation planning / implementation. Essential Duties and Responsibilities: Partner with Business Unit HRBP to provide proactive guidance, communications, and HR generalist support to employees Ensure consistent application and compliance of HR policies / procedures and local laws and practices as well as partner with HR Operations team and the COE’s to ensure consistent execution of HR policies and initiatives Support execution of HR programs and processes, manage different priorities concurrently through project management, systems knowledge, and effective communications Support team members in the implementation of HR initiatives within the country, and support HR team in resolving HR operational issues Lead change management programs and initiatives, lead employee engagement initiatives and cultural programs, as well as the implementation and/or execution of applicable training programs Lead Labor Relations Strategy to support business strategy Lead local payroll process Support the non-production Talent Acquisition Process and onboarding Support special projects, compensation process and the delivery of Talent Management & Organizational Effectiveness programs such as Performance Management Process (PMP), Management, Succession & Development (MS&D), Great Place to Work (GPTW), Global Employee Opinion Survey (GEOS), etc. Manage International Mobility, inbound and outbound Required Skills / Experience / Competencies: Bachelor’s in Human Resources, Business Administration, Management, or related discipline Minimum 6 to 8 years of HR generalist, HR Operations experience and/or related fields Knowledge of general HR policies, procedures, and HR leading practices and applicable laws/regulations in the country of employment Experience in Payroll, HR operations and government related. Experience in Recruitment and Selection is preferable Benefits & Culture: SC Johnson is committed to providing a Great Place to Work for all its employees. Along with a competitive base salary, here are just some of the benefits you receive when joining the SC Johnson Family - Ongoing training and development Free onsite parking Subsidized fitness sessions Family-owned company, with a family feel Be a member of a company championing a better world through sustainability and environmental protection measures SC Johnson Asia has been recognized as the Best Multinational Workplace by Great Place to Work® !

Job_Title: ็HR Administrator
Job_Description: Last Updated : 03.01.2024 | Viewers 4 Salary : เงินเดือน 10,001 - 15,000 (THB) Types of employees : ประเภทงาน Full-time เต็มเวลา Area : ปฎิบัติงานที่จังหวัด Education : การศึกษา Higher Vocational Certificate ปวส Experience : ประสบการณ์การทำงาน 1 Year (ปี) Gender : เพศ Male/Female ชาย/หญิง Age : อายุ Non-Specific ไม่จำกัดอายุ Unit : จำนวนรับ 1 อัตรา New Graduated : นักศึกษาจบใหม่ No ไม่รับพิจารณา Foreigner : ชาวต่างชาติ No ไม่รับพิจารณา Disabled : ผู้พิการ No ไม่รับพิจารณา Night shift : ตำแหน่งงานกะดึก No ไม่ใช่ Job Details รายละเอียดงาน 1. Maintains department office area in an organized and professional manner including supplies and equipment. 2. Coordinates activities, information meetings, and various training programs. 3. Provides administrative support in the preparation of correspondence, reports, schedules, confidential materials and various employee issues. 4. Implements and maintains a filing system, both paper, and computer. 5. Replenishes office supplies as needed. 6. Answers the telephone in a professional manner and assists internal guests with any questions, directions to the property, etc. 7. Assists candidates to post their resume on line. 8. Participates in strategic planning and budgeting of activities that meet and support the company- s objectives. 9. Assists the HR Director with the recruitment, interviewing, and selection processes and sends appropriate correspondence to all applicants in a timely manner. 10. Provides administrative support to the department. 11. Plans and assists in conducting monthly new hire orientation programs. 12. Support the department implementing training and development programs to ensure optimal company-wide performance. 13. Assists in conducting surveys. 14. Works closely with all the employees to ensure a positive work environment. 15. Maintains a daily log of important information to share with the department. 16. Assists in finding housing units for the employee. 17. Assists decorating and posting all the necessary information in the bulletin boards and monthly newsletter. 18. Continue to help build and maintain a first-rate team. Job_Title: Burmese Interpreter (ล่ามภาษาพม่า)
Company: Chiang Mai Ram Hospital Co., Ltd.
Job_Description:
ตำแหน่ง :            Burmese Interpreter (ล่ามภาษาพม่า) personality :     - Female or Male, pleasant - Age 25 – 35 years old - Bachelor's degree or higher in any field - At least 2 years experience in customer services field - Mature, positive thinking, Customer service/People  oriented and good communication skills,
                       reliable, good team player as well as hardworking - Strong organizational and interpersonal skills and able to work flexible hours - Pleasant personality & problem solving skills. - Self-motivated and able to work innovatively and independently. - Good command of spoken Thai and other languages are advantage - Computer literate in Microsoft Office and Internet จำนวน 1 อัตรา แนบเอกสารในการสมัครดังนี้ 1. สำเนาหลักฐานการศึกษา                                                                                  จำนวน 1 ฉบับ
                            (หนังสือรับรองคุณวุฒิ, ใบปริญญาบัตร/ประกาศนียบัตร, Transcript) พร้อมแสดงฉบับจริง    
                        2. สำเนาใบอนุญาตประกอบวิชาชีพ/ประกอบโรคศิลปะ                                                      จำนวน 1 ฉบับ
                           (เฉพาะตำแหน่งเภสัชกร, รังสีเทคนิค, เทคนิคการแพทย์และพยาบาล) พร้อมแสดงฉบับจริง
                        3. ประกาศนียบัตรจบหลักสูตรผู้ช่วยทางการพยาบาล (กรณีสมัครผู้ช่วยพยาบาล)                        จำนวน 1 ฉบับ
                        4. สำเนาบัตรสมาชิกสภาการพยาบาล (กรณีสมัครพยาบาล)                                                 จำนวน 1 ฉบับ   
                        5. สำเนาหนังสือรับรองการผ่านงาน (ถ้ามี)                                                                  จำนวน 1 ฉบับ   
                        6. สำเนาบัตรประชาชน                                                                                       จำนวน 1 ฉบับ
                        7. สำเนาทะเบียนบ้าน                                                                                         จำนวน 1 ฉบับ
                        8. สำเนาทะเบียนสมรส (ถ้ามี)                                                                                จำนวน 1 ฉบับ
                        9. สำเนาหลักฐานการเปลี่ยนชื่อ-สกุล (ถ้ามี)                                                                 จำนวน 1 ฉบับ
                       10. สำเนาสูติบัตรของบุตร-ธิดา (ถ้ามี)                                                                       จำนวน 1 ฉบับ
                       11. รูปถ่ายปัจจุบันหน้าตรงไม่สวมแว่น (ไม่เกิน 6 เดือน) ขนาด 1 นิ้วหรือ 2 นิ้ว                            จำนวน 1 รูป
                        หากใบสมัครของท่านหลักฐานไม่ครบ ไม่รับพิจารณาใบสมัคร ติดต่อสมัครได้ที่ 1.  โครงการเชียงใหม่ ราม คอมเพล็กซ์ อาคารสำนักงานชั้น 1 แผนกธุรการและบุคคล โทร. (052) 004-620 ต่อ 5114 2. ส่งใบสมัครทางไปรษณีย์มาตามที่อยู่ดังต่อไปนี้ " โครงการเชียงใหม่ ราม คอมเพล็กซ์ อาคารสำนักงานชั้น 1 แผนกธุรการและบุคคล เลขที่ 20 ต.ศรีภูมิ อ.เมือง จ.เชียงใหม่ รหัสไปรษณีย์ 50200 " 3. Job_Title: ธุรการฝ่ายขาย/ประสานงานขาย ด่วน!! พัทยา
Job_Description: สถานที่ทำงาน : บางละมุง, ชลบุรี - 20150 Thailand อัตราค่าจ้าง : 10,000.00 - 12,000+ ต่อเดือน ตำแหน่ง ธุรการฝ่ายขาย/ประสานงานขาย เงินเดือนเริ่มต้น 10,000-12,000 บาท++ หรือตามประสบการณ์ ความสามารถและการตกลง สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน Frost ice siam ข้างฟาร์มแกะพัทยา ตรงข้ามโรงเรียนนานาชาติรีเจ้นท์ / ก่อนถึงถนนเส้นมอเตอร์เวย์หมายเลข7 รายละเอียดงาน *คีย์ข้อมูล ตอบอีเมล รับโทรศัพท์ ทำใบเสนอราคา เอกสารประกอบการขาย คุณสมบัติ - ไม่จำกัดเพศ อายุ 20 ปีขึ้นไป - วุฒิ ม.6 ปวช.-ป.ตรี - ละเอียด รอบคอบ มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ - ตรงต่อเวลา ขยัน ทนงาน - มีความซื่อสัตย์ มีใจรักงานบริการ ยิ้มแย้มแจ่มใส ไม่เกี่ยงงาน สู้งาน * ทุกตำแหน่งถ้าใช้ภาษาอังกฤษได้จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ * สวัสดิการ -ประกันสังคม -มีสวัสดิการกองทุนพนักงาน -อื่นๆ ตามกฎหมายกำหนด บริษัท ฟรอสท์ เมนเนจเม้นท์ จำกัด (Frost ice siam) ข้างฟาร์มแกะพัทยา ติดต่อ ฝ่ายบุคคล สอบถามโทร. 0636359145 *สมัครได้ทุกวัน ตั้งแต่ 09:00-17:00 น. หรือส่งประวัติพร้อมรูปถ่ายมาที่ Kritchapon@frostsiam.com หรือสมัครผ่านหน้าเว็บ เอกสารที่ต้องใช้ในการสมัครงาน ผู้สมัครทุกท่านที่สนใจสมัครงานในตำแหน่งงานใดๆ กับบริษัท กรุณาแนบเอกสารการสมัครงาน มีรายการดังนี้ คำแนะนำ โปรดเซ็นต์ชื่อรับรองสำเนาถูกต้องในเอกสารทุกใบ และเขียนกำกับว่าใช้ในการสมัครงานเท่านั้น 1. สำเนาบัตรประชาชน ทะเบียนบ้าน วุฒิการศึกษา ใบผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร (จำเป็นต้องนำไป) 2. รูปถ่าย แนะนำ 1 นิ้ว 2 รูป (จำเป็นต้องนำไปครับ) 3. สำเนาเอกสารราชการต่างๆ เช่น ใบเปลี่ยนชื่อ- สกุล / ใบผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร ฯ (ถ้ามี) 4. สำเนาหนังสือรับรองต่างๆ / สำเนาใบขับขี่ (ถ้างานนั้นเกี่ยวกับการขับรถ) 5. Slip เงินเดือนจากบริษัทปัจจุบัน หรือบริษัทสุดท้ายที่ท่านทำงาน (ถ้ามี) ระดับการศึกษา Qualification : ปวช./ม.6 ขึ้นไป เว็บไซต์ Website : N / A FROST ( Magical Ice of Siam ) ที่อยู่ที่ติดต่อ บริษัท ฟรอสท์ เมนเนจเม้นท์ จำกัด ติดกับฟาร์มแกะพัทยา สถานที่ตั้ง ตรงข้ามโรงเรียนนานาชาติรีเจ้นท์ / ก่อนถึงถนนเส้นมอเตอร์เวย์หมายเลข7 บางละมุง, ชลบุรี - 20150 Thailand » (View)มีตำแหน่งว่าง 7 ตำแหน่งงาน ผู้รับสมัคร : ฝ่ายบุคคล (ติดต่อ จ-อา. 09:00-17:00 น.) โทรศัพท์ : 063-6359145, 062 -9265442 แฟกซ์ : - เว็บไซต์ : N / A ประเภทธกิจการ : ท่องเที่ยว / พิพิธภัณฑ์ / โรงละคร โครงการ FROST ICE OF SIAM (สถานที่ตั้ง ตรงข้ามโรงเรียนนานาชาติรีเจ้นท์ / ก่อนถึงถนนเส้นมอเตอร์เวย์หมายเลข7) สถานที่ท่องเที่ยวแห่งใหม่ในเมืองพัทยา ชมประติมากรรมน้ำแข็งสะท้อนความเป็นสยามมหานครแห่งศิลปะ และสถาปัตยกรรม พบประสบการณ์ความเย็นสุดมหัศจรรย์ แห่งโดมน้ำแข็งที่ใหญ่ที่สุดในอาเซียน ด้วยอุณหภูมิ – 10 องศา ภายในโดมมี บาร์น้ำแข็ง พร้อมเครื่องดื่มสุดพิเศษในอุณหภูมิเย็นฉ่ำ ภายนอกพบกับประติกรรมทราบขาว ในสวนสวยที่คุณสามารถมาเดินเล่น พร้อมเก็บภาพความประทับใจจากสวนประติมากรรมหลากหลายรูปแบบ ทั้งศิลปะจากไทยและ ระดับสากล

Job_Title: [Summer Internship 2024] Marketing Brand Intern
Job_Description: [Summer Internship 2024] Marketing Brand Intern Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. About the Brand Team: At Agoda, we are the guardians of the brand, dedicated to establishing Agoda as a trusted name in global travel. Our mission is to shape, promote, and enhance the Agoda brand identity. We engage in a wide range of projects and collaborations with different departments at Agoda, ensuring that our work is diverse and constantly evolving. Whether it’s campaign creation, asset production, or employee engagement initiatives, our team is at the forefront of elevating the Agoda brand. The opportunity: As a Brand Intern, you will have the unique opportunity to contribute to the development and enhancement of Agoda’s brand, specifically by assisting in the management of our swag store. Your responsibilities will include: Supporting Swag Store Workflow: Collaborate with the brand management team to ensure the smooth operation of Agoda’s swag store, including managing orders, inventory, and customer inquiries. Defining Priorities and Objectives: Work closely with the brand management team to help define and prioritize objectives for the swag store, aligning with our brand’s mission and goals. Stakeholder Communication: Maintain open and effective communication with various stakeholders, including the store administrator, fulfillment house, legal, finance, people’s team, and departmental budget holders. Meeting Logistics: Organize and provide logistical support for brand-related meetings and initiatives. Ad-Hoc Administrative Assistance: Offer ad-hoc administrative support to senior management, contributing to the efficient functioning of the brand team. What you’ll need to succeed : Able to do the internship from 27th of May to 2nd August 2024 (10-week program) Currently a 3rd-year or below university student at a respected university Strong communication skills with fluency in English, both written and verbal. A good understanding of MS Office applications. The ability to prioritize tasks, manage workloads, and meet project deadlines effectively. A balance of the ability to work independently and be a valuable team player. A keen eye for detail, ensuring accuracy and precision in all tasks. A willingness to embrace new technologies and a quick learner. #Students #1 #summerintern Equal Opportunity Employer At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics. We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy. To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

Job_Title: [Summer Internship 2024] Talent Acquisition Project Coordinator Intern
Job_Description: [Summer Internship 2024] Talent Acquisition Project Coordinator Intern Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know our Team: The Customer Experience Group of Agoda effectively serves our customers and partners to ensure satisfying results. This great task is accomplished with the support of our Global Service Vertical team. We serve as the backbone for Customer Experience Group’s global operations. Our team is comprised of project managers, process owners, analysts, and talent management. Together we work nonstop to improve the quality and efficiency of our customer and partner support processes. Working with the Global Service Vertical team is a great opportunity to collaborate with various stakeholders and develop initiatives with our sister companies and external partners all over the world. We are a very data-driven environment, eager to move fast and learn through experimentation. A clear focus on supporting our customers and partners is bolstered by a strong, entrepreneurial culture that enriches us and Agoda’s business performance. The Opportunity: As a CEG Talent Acquisition Project Coordinator Intern, you will play a vital role in assisting the Talent Acquisition team in planning and executing various projects and initiatives related to talent acquisition. This internship offers valuable hands-on experience in talent acquisition, making it an excellent opportunity for students or individuals looking to gain insight into the world of talent acquisition. In this Role, you’ll get to: Project Support: Assist in planning, organizing, and executing talent acquisition projects and initiatives, such as recruitment events, employer branding campaigns, and process improvements. Candidate Sourcing: Collaborate with the Talent Acquisition team to identify potential candidates through various channels, including job boards, social media, and professional networks. Administrative Tasks: Provide administrative support, including scheduling interviews, managing candidate communications, and maintaining applicant tracking systems. Data Management: Collect and maintain recruitment data, analyze key metrics, and generate reports to measure the effectiveness of talent acquisition strategies. Collaboration: Work closely with the Talent Acquisition team, and other relevant teams to ensure the successful implementation of talent acquisition projects. Job_Title: Senior Manager/ Manager Talent Acquisition (Bangkok based)
Job_Description: Senior Manager/ Manager Talent Acquisition (Bangkok based) Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know our Team: The People Team is a purveyor of opportunity, searching the globe for the most talented individuals and offering them an open, collaborative workplace. By prioritizing skill and potential, we have cultivated a powerful assembly of professionals through our drive for equal opportunity and diversity. We make the move to Agoda a breeze with assisted onboarding programs, and we continue to support and enrich our thousands of Agoda employees through individual growth with outstanding learning programs and various means of assistance. Our development of incredible benefits has ensured everyone can stay strong, healthy, and happy during their time at Agoda. Leading ambitious changes and making a positive impact in the lives of our employees, the People Team is a crucial and rewarding part of the Agoda family. The Opportunity: In this role, you will be based in Agoda’s Bangkok Office and lead a team of Managers, Leads, TA Partners and Associate TA Partners while also collaborate with multiple stakeholders such as Operations leaders, HR Generalists, HR Specialist, Technology & Analytics team etc. You will be focusing on two different areas including leading your team to achieve set hiring targets for volume positions (e.g. Customer Experience Specialists) and successfully executes project to continuously improve the recruitment function in CEG. In this Role, you’ll get to: Lead the team to hire to target and be 100% staffed by optimizing sourcing, recruitment funnel and the team organization Drive improvements to increase the quality of hires (measured by objective metrics) through data-driven experimentation Ensure operational excellence in your team for every step of the recruitment process (new positions intake, JDs, pre-screening, interviews scorecards, offer communication, etc.) Leverage and analyze Data and Recruitment Reports to effectively partner with the Team and Business Reduce the cost per hire Ensure that Hiring Managers supported by your team develop interviewing skills Develop strategies to build talent pipelines and effectively raise or lower the bar adapting to hiring needs Manage, coach and build a team of strong Recruiters and enable them to hire game changers for Agoda Lead projects to transform the recruitment function. Examples of possible projects are: – Defining operational excellence in the recruitment process – Introducing new assessment tools – Building an upskilling program for Recruiters – Experimenting with different recruitment processes What you’ll Need to Succeed: At least 8 years of experience in recruitment and a minimum of 4 years of team management experience (including managing managers) in a fast-paced, dynamic global environment Previous experience in hiring for North & Southeast Asia market is a plus Ability to leverage data to take decisions and optimize the results Exposure to headcount models and resource planning is a must Leadership skills to rally recruiters to achieve stretch targets Ability to work effectively with multiple stakeholders Fluent in English Autonomous and highly motivated with a strong sense of urgency. Equal Opportunity Employer At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics. Job_Title: HR Associate Manager (GA & Visa)
Job_Description: Job Purpose We are seeking a Visa & Work Permit specialist for our Human Resources team who will be responsible for work permit & visa application and renewal tasks as well other administrative tasks. Duties and responsibilities Prepare all the necessary documents for visa and work permit application processes for new employees and renewals for existing employees. Be updated in changes in regulations and laws in regards to visa and work permit and Thailand immigration laws. Maintain good relations with immigration offices and the Department of Labor. Support line managers/ employees on key HR Operations as required. Coordinate with other departments in accordance with HR jobs. Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources Management or related fields Minimum 1 year of experience in payroll and attendance operation processes Experience with Visa & Work Permit and GA tasks is preferred. Good abilities in using Microsoft Word, Powerpoint and Excel Good command of written and spoken English Attention to detail Self-motivated and driven to succeed. Strong personal and professional ethics & values.

Job_Description:
Last Updated : 28.12.2023 | Viewers 2,261 Salary : เงินเดือน N/A (THB) Types of employees : ประเภทงาน Full-time เต็มเวลา Area : ปฎิบัติงานที่จังหวัด Education : การศึกษา Vocational Certificate ปวช Experience : ประสบการณ์การทำงาน 2 Year (ปี) Gender : เพศ Male/Female ชาย/หญิง Age : อายุ Not over 40 years old อายุไม่เกิน 40 ปี Unit : จำนวนรับ 1 อัตรา New Graduated : นักศึกษาจบใหม่ No ไม่รับพิจารณา Foreigner : ชาวต่างชาติ No ไม่รับพิจารณา Disabled : ผู้พิการ No ไม่รับพิจารณา Night shift : ตำแหน่งงานกะดึก Yes ใช่ Job Qualifications ข้อกำหนด 1. At least High Vocational diploma in any relevant discipline 2. Minimum of 2 years in Housekeeping/ Janitorial experience 3. Knowledgeable in Housekeeping operation and cleaning methods 4. Have good English communication skills both in written and spoken 5. Detail-oriented and posses pleasant personality with good communication and interpersonal skills Job Details รายละเอียดงาน ASAI Hotels, operating under the umbrella of Dusit Hotels and Resorts, is an Asian-inspired collection of hotels targeting on becoming an access point for curious millennial-minded travellers who want to experience vibrant and diverse neighbourhoods around the world like a local. ASAI Bangkok Chinatown takes up five floors above 4 floors of retail space with a total of 224 rooms. - To supervise cleaning personnel; to inspect guest rooms, service apartment, to ensure cleanliness in all public access areas including offices, outlets, rest-rooms, to report rooms ready for occupancy after cleaning, and to manage the supply and distribution of all linens and uniforms. Suggest and develop own training programs to improve efficiency, productivity and performance. Maintain a worksheet to record rooms inspected daily, assignments for housemen, special projects, guest room status, maintenance deficiencies and significant events and activities during shift. Welfare สวัสดิการ Benefits: * Group Medical insurance * Group Life Insurance * Five-day work week * Monthly Service Charge * Provident Fund * Performance bonus Interested candidates, please send your cover letter and CV at email: ASAICareers@dusit.com Contact ข้อมูลติดต่อ Khun Chanon Kheebsungnoen (Human Resources Manager) ASAI Bangkok Chinatown
531 Charoen Krung Road, Pom Prap,

Job_Title: Executive Secretary
Job_Description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they are doing! We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business. Job Summary The Executive Secretary will focus maintaining daily task lists on priority basis, take care of travelling arrangement, personal arrangements, and coordinate with different departments to make sure management’s schedule are maximized with efficiency Job Description: 1.) Responsible for supporting management. Provides administrative support , including scheduling, writing correspondence, emailing, handling visitors,new comer and answering questions and requests.
2.) Prepare and pre-screen document before passing to executive management as well as keep records and filing
3.) Arranges corporate travel and meetings by developing itineraries and agendas; scheduling the corporate ; booking transportation; arranging lodging and meeting accommodations logistics & itinerary arrangements.
4.) Handle all incoming and outgoing correspondences, and communicate information both internally and externally.
5.) Attend meetings, create agendas and take minutes - shorthand may be required to do this
6.) Coordinate and collaborate with Executives/ Head of department , both internally and externally.
7.) Perform other related duties as assigned Qualification: If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Job_Title: Fulfillment Manager (O2O Operation) (Sisaket)
Job_Description:
Role & Responsibility 1. รับผิดชอบการดำเนินงานของ O2O operations การกำกับและควบคุม การดูแลกำไรและขาดทุน  และความพึงพอใจในการการบริการลูกค้า. 2. ดูแลทีมงาน O2O operations ทั้งด้านกำลังคนและรถขนส่ง และการดำเนินงานทั้งหมด ทั้งในเรื่อง SLA ในการส่งมอบสินค้า, การตรงต่อเวลา ความพร้อมของสินค้าในการขาย โดยเฉพาะรายการสินค้าใน Website 3. ดูแลและช่วยเหลือในการปฏิบัติตามคำสั่งซื้อของลูกค้าจากทุกช่องทาง ทั้งจากช่องทางเว็บไซต์ คำสั่งซื้อทางโทรศัพท์ คำสั่งซื้อทาง e-mail  และข้อความ ได้อย่างถูกต้องและตรงเวลา เพื่อไม่ให้เกิดรายการสินค้าที่ต้องจัดส่งตกค้าง 4. ร่วมกับกับหน่วยงานอื่น ทั้งภายใน และภายนอกสโตร์ แก้ไขปัญหา ที่อาจเกี่ยวข้องกับการดำเนินงานของ O2O operations, รายการสินค้าและความพร้อมของรายการสินค้า บนช่องทางการสั่งซื้อสินค้า รวมไปถึงการให้บริการลูกค้า 5. รับผิดชอบกิจกรรมประจำวันในกำกับดูแลทีมงาน  รวมไปถึง การบริการลูกค้า การจัดการข้อเรียกร้องจากบริการ การร้องเรียน การร้องทุกข์ และการขอแก้ไข รับผิดชอบด้านคุณภาพ และประสิทธิภาพของทีมงาน 6. บริหารจัดการต้นทุนการจัดส่ง จัดการค่าใช้จ่ายต่อ truckload, และค่าใช้จ่ายต่อไมล์; สนับสนุนเป้าหมายทางการเงิน ใช้ประโยชน์จากการบริหารจัดการขนส่งอย่างเต็มที่เพื่อลดต้นทุนการขนส่ง  ตรวจสอบบัญชีค่าใช้จ่ายทั้งหมดที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการขนส่ง 7. บริหารจัดการความสัมพันธ์กับผู้ให้บริการขนส่ง และวางแผนเพื่อให้แน่ใจว่ามีการส่งมอบให้กับลูกค้าได้ทันเวลา 8. กำกับดูแลการปฏิบัติงานของพนักงาน O2O เป็นที่ปรึกษาและผู้ฝึกสอน ฝึกอบรมตามความเหมาะสม Qualification • ปริญญาตรีในสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง เช่น การจัดการโลจิสติกส์ บริหารธุรกิจการ การจัดการงานปฏิบัติการไม่น้อยกว่า 5 ปี • มีประสบการณ์ด้านการจัดการสินค้าคงคลัง 5 ปีขึ้นไป หรือมีภูมิหลังในการดำเนินงานด้านคลังสินค้าและการขนส่ง • ความสามารถในการจัดการงบประมาณ, ทักษะการบริหารทีม และด้านการสื่อสารและการจัดลำความงาน • สะดวกปฏิบัติงาน 6 วัน/สัปดาห์ และทำงานเป็นกะได้ (มีกะ Night Shift) Contact : jobs@cpaxtra.co.th / Line : @makrojob Tel. 02-067-8153 , 02 -067-8148 , 02-067-8166 Interested candidate, please send resume in Word Format with academic records and recent photo via APPLY NOW CP Axtra Public Company Limited. 1468 Phatthanakan Road, Khwaeng Suan Luang, Khet Suan Luang, Bangkok 10250
 Tel : 02-067-8999 Fax: 02-067-9888 Website: www.siammakro.co.th

Job_Title: Specialist, Global Mobility
Job_Description: Job Title: Specialist, Global Mobility Job Description Job Description: Global Mobility Specialist As the Global Mobility Specialist, you will be instrumental in leading the day-to-day management of Concentrix’s mobility and immigration program. He/she will partner with employees throughout the organization to provide in-depth counsel of mobility and immigration processes, identify process and policy gaps, coordinate with our third-party immigration, tax and relocation vendor’s to ensure case is moving in right direction. You will also be a key player in driving policy and process improvements. This position requires a deep analytical and process-oriented mindset and have Global Mobility experience from a global organization. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Responsible for all Global Mobility and Immigration policies and processes. Act as a single point of contact to employees throughout the mobility process. Be a key point of contact providing support between employees and business managers, Immigration partners, tax services partners, local visa vendors and relocation management company Provide guidance and direction to employees and their managers on policies, immigration, taxes, and other mobility related tasks Work with HR Partners to guide and assist with global mobility related matters Support the wider Global Mobility Team with day-to-day administration, employee inquiries, and implementation of mobility initiatives. Oversee the management of visa/work permits and green card process for employees. Collaborate with other departments within the company on overall coordination of the Global Mobility Program (i.e., Legal, Payroll, Tax, Finance). Manage end to end Assignment administration (Pre-On-Post assignment). Coordinate with various types of vendors- immigration tax and relocation Drive strategic program improvements based on market data and internal feedback. Participate in special projects as needed. Other duties as assigned. Essential Requirement: Minimum of 3- 4 years’ experience in the Global Mobility process with expertise in the UK and Europe visa & Immigration matters. A good understanding of the rest of the world's visa and immigration processes. Good understanding of expat Labor Law Ability to solve new countries, prepare the cost of living, and assignment expense estimate. Ability to maintain multiple trackers and work diligently on process governance and achieve good governance scores. Ability to adapt to fast changing landscape Capacity to manage and work closely with senior executives within organizations. Strong planning and organizational ability Ability to maintain and manage a large amounts of employee data. Excellent Excel and Presentation skills Good analytical & reporting knowledge. Team player with excellent communication skills Location: THA Bangkok - Bhiraj Tower at Bitech, Unit No - 1707,1708,1709,1710,1711,1712 Language Requirements: Time Type: Full time If you are a California resident, by submitting your information, you acknowledge that you have read and have access to the Job Applicant Privacy Notice for California Residents

Job Details รายละเอียดงาน โรงแรม Best Western Sukhumvit 20 กำลังเปิดรับสมัครตำแหน่ง Assistant Human Resources Manager / HR Supervisor (สุขุมวิท ซอย 20) Responsibilities: - Assists in the routine function of Personnel Administration as well as employee welfare & benefit and all employee activities. - Takes responsibility for employee employment and resignation. - Follows up employee performance evaluation. - Maintains management leaves record. - Assists in the communication flow to all hotel employee through notice board, newsletter. - Takes responsibility for bulletin and direct communication with employee regarding Personnel Policies and Hotel rules and regulations. - Takes responsibility for personal file transfer & communication with labor office. - Checks and maintains good condition of all employee facilities like locker rooms, employee sleeping room. - Follows up employment contract review. - Takes responsibility for collection of performance evaluation. - Prepares employment contract for renewal of contract. - Follows up employee performance evaluation. - Responsible for training all levels of employee including orientation. Job_Title: Office Administrator
Job_Description: We are a professional certified, licensed and insured contractor in Malaysia that specializes in virtually every aspect of communications infrastructure design and installations. From Cat5e, Cat6, Cat7 Data Cabling and Fiber Optics, to an entire suite of structured cabling redesign and ELV (Extra Low Voltage) services, let us help keep costs low and everything easier. The Role You will be responsible for : Working closely with Team Executives as well as other support functions to provide proactive and effective general administrative assistance across a diverse range of tasks. Scheduling and coordinating meetings. Providing other organisational support such as ordering supplies and equipment. Administering leave records, medical and insurance claims. Liaising with building management on any facilities related issues. Managing and maintaining executives’ schedules and appointments. Ideal Profile You have at least 1 year experience within a Admin Assistant role, ideally within the IT industry. You are organised and have good interpersonal skills. You have good computer skills ( MS Word, Excel, Powerpoint). You are a strong team player who can manage multiple stakeholders You pay strong attention to detail and deliver work that is of a high standard You are adaptable and thrive in changing environments What's on Offer? Opportunity to make a positive impact Attractive compensation package Opening within a company with a solid track record of success

Job_Title: Finance and Admin Officer
Job_Description:
: Voluntary Service Overseas (VSO) : 29 Nov 2023 10 / December / 2023 Role overview Make a difference by supporting VSO's work, empowering the most vulnerable and marginalised people to lead and shape their own development ! You will be responsible for processing and managing financial transactions, financial risk management and reporting, procurement, stock management and other administrative duties for the Active Citizenship Through Inclusive Volunteering & Empowerment (ACTIVE) grant in Thailand. For a detailed overview of responsibilities see attached job description. This is a national, fixed term contract ending 31st March 2024 with a high possibility of extension until 31st March 2025 (decision on new funding expected in January). The programme you will be supporting will strengthen civil society and build a culture of volunteerism and civic engagement, whilst building the capacity of governments and service providers to respond to the demands of marginalised citizens. Ideal Applicant Summary The ideal candidate has a Bachelor Degree or higher in business, accounting and finance in a Financial administration position including experience in budgeting, forecasting and financial reporting, including knowledge of donor funded grants. Competencies and Behaviour At VSO we believe progress is only possible by working together. Whether you want to join us as an employee, or as a volunteer working in your own country, overseas or online, our selection process includes an assessment based on these core competencies: • Ability to be open minded and respectful • Ability to be resilient and adaptive to new situations • Ability to facilitate positive change and build sustainable working relationships • Ability to seek and share knowledge VSO promotes equal opportunities and values a diverse workforce. Equal Opportunities
VSO promotes equal opportunities and values a diverse workforce. PLEASE NOTE: VSO reserves the right to close this job early if we receive a sufficient number of applications. We can only accept applications via the VSO Website using this job link. We cannot accept applications or CVs sent by email. Contact : hans.voerman@vsoint.org

Job_Title: Administrative Officer
Job_Description: Administration: Assist with database processing including database entry, database updating, database compilation and help to communicate information from HR & Admin Team to TBC staff. Assist front-office reception services, including telephone exchange and recording postal correspondence. Assist with delivery and receipt of goods and correspondence (e.g. dealing with mail & courier services). Assist with travel, accommodation and logistical arrangements for staff and visitors (e.g. arranging bookings, tickets, taxis, etc.) Provide secretarial support as required (e.g. typing narrative reports, data entry, scanning and copying) Assist in logistics and food preparation for meetings, trainings, and workshops. Update, maintain and consolidate TBC employees’ leave record. Maintain office equipment and facilities in good working condition and keep the record for Fixed Assets Register/Inventory Record. Assist the purchase and monitoring of office supplies following TBC procurement procedures (e.g. collecting quotes). Arrange for stocks (e.g. stationery and office supplies) to be replenished and equipment (e.g. air conditioning units and phones) to be repaired where necessary. Assist with bill payments following the TBC Staff Policy Manual (e.g. checking receipts and paying bills). Government liaison: Support visa and work permit application process for international staff and their dependences. Coordinate with Ministry of Interior and TBC’s field office to support processing all camp pass requests  and permission letters Other Occasional Duties: Provide other forms of support as required and/or requested by HR & Admin Specialist. Support HR & Admin team during an absence of a team member. Education Bachelor in related field Experience in Humanitarian or Related Field Not required but would be beneficial Experience in specific field or closely- related job, technical and behavioural skills Bachelor in related field 2-3 years of experience in Administrative work Good people and inter-personnel skills with positive thinking is a must Fair command of Thai & English both in writing and speaking Good computer literacy in MS office esp. MS Xcel and PowerPoint

Job_Title: Communication Specialist
Job_Description: As Satit Pattana Secondary School conducts teaching both in Thai and English, and we aim to raise our teaching standard to be a world-class Thai-International school, there is a need for dynamic and bilingual communications among teachers, parents and students. We are looking for an efficient communicator who are fluent both in Thai and English. His/Her responsibility includes: * Regularly create and write bilingual contents such as communication newsletters, announcements and social media posts to increase parents’ engagement and increase awareness for the school. * Answer to parent’s enquiry via Line@ and Facebook page * Attend meetings with teachers and the Thai management executives and coordinate with foreign language teachers * Assist the Admission team with the execution of school events

Job_Description:

Job_Title: Program Assistant
Job_Description: : Heinrich Böll Stiftung Southeast Asia Regional Office : 29 Nov 2023 02 / January / 2024 We are looking for a Program Assistant to join our team! Click here for .pdf Deadline to apply: January 2nd 2024 The Heinrich Böll Stiftung (hbs) is the German Green Foundation, which is part of the Green movement and conducts and supports civic educational and awareness building activities worldwide. Our main tenets are ecology and sustainability, participation and social justice. The Office in Bangkok is the Southeast Asia Regional Office, which serves as a platform for exchange and advocacy. https://th.boell.org/en Major duties and responsibilities Project Management Support project cycle management, work flows, development and implementation of projects of the four program components of the hbs Southeast Asia Regional Office Assist and support the three Program Coordinators in their self-implemented activities and projects in the area of regional dialogue, democracy and participation, ecology and social justice and climate Responsibility of project management and partner management of one ecology and social justice project Assisting Program Coordinators with budget management and tracking, report writing, monitoring, follow ups with partners Support research and writing Support event management and prepare admin and logistics Others assignment from Director and Program Coordinators 2. Communication Handling of social media accounts Simple graphic design using canva Support website management and updating (CMS:Drupal) Support creation of monthly newsletter ASEAN Press Review The requirements of the  Program Assistant are: BA degree in political sciences, development studies, environmental studies, gender studies or other relevant degree 1-3 years of work experience in a non-profit organization or high motivation to join this sector Experience in international work environment or experience abroad is an asset e.g. study or internship abroad Excellent spoken and written Thai, excellent spoken and written English, other Southeast Asian language is an asset Good communicator and networker Intercultural sensitivity and competence (this relates to both areas of work: inside office/team work as well as with partners) and interpersonal skills. Highly motivated to be a team player Willingness to understand project work across the region and to focus on problem-solving Ability and willingness to learn Interest in the Southeast Asia region, ASEAN, political developments Identification with values of hbs – social justice, gender democracy, inclusion Very good computer literacy (Word, Excel, Internet and Social Media use) Excellent organizational skills (time management, schedule organization, resource management. Proven ability to use own initiative and act responsibly Ready to travel in the region or in Thailand Please share your application by January 2nd 2024 . The application should consists of a letter of motivation and a CV , both as one pdf document named: “Program Assistant_FIRSTNAME_LASTNAME”. Send the application to: info@th.boell.org Contact : info@th.boell.org

Job_Title: Document Executive
Job_Description: Established in 2016, Steel Plus Trading is a solutions focused trading company for the steel industry. Our brand is prized for providing trading and agent services spanning across semi-finished and finished steel products, as well as raw materials for the production of steel. Our international reach connects the world between buyers and sellers, and provides market intelligence to aid in decision making. With main offices in Singapore and Vietnam, we have a strong buyer relationships within South East Asia including Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, etc. And we have numerous years of experiences working together with material suppliers from the US, Europe, Hong Kong, Japan, and Malaysia, among others. The Role Your responsibilities will include: Issuing and following the contract Checking the shipment documents Following up with the payment according to the payment term Follow up shipment schedules, Arrivals, and Quality of every shipment Maintain and update the contract list Provide administrative assistance to staff and management Ideal Profile - Proficiency in MS Word, MS Excel, e-mail, internet, etc - Good communication in English to be able to effectively liaise with stakeholders in the region. - Good knowledge of international trade - Strong communication and interpersonal skills - Open-minded and strong service mindset - Be calm, patient and control your emotions well - Good sense of responsibility and teamwork. - Carefulness at work What's on Offer? Attractive compensation package Opening within a company with a solid track record of success Flexible working options

Job_Title: Administrative Assistant
Job_Description: Who We Are: Bluenotes has been a proudly Canadian company since 1942 (the original store was called Thrifty’s at the corner of Queen & Church St in Toronto). From day one, our roots have been firmly planted in denim. By keeping up with the latest trends throughout the decades, we have consistently offered our customers the latest denim fits, washes and styles, maintaining Bluenotes’ reputation as one of the top denim retailers in Canada. We recognize that our customers have an eye for fashion and trends but still value a casual lifestyle. We focus on wardrobe essentials – we’re here to give you everything you need in your closet and more! Jeans, joggers, hoodies, graphics, plaids and tees, and accessories for every outfit - Bluenotes has everything you need for the day-to-day! With over 120 stores nationwide, and our online site Bluenotes.com offering shipping in both Canada and the US, we continue to grow and offer quality goods and awesome deals. We’re committed to delivering great customer service and our priorities reflect our customer's enthusiasm for today’s generation. We want you to take pride in being yourself! The Role You will be responsible for : Providing support to the full spectrum of HR functions including talent acquisition, learning and development and compensation and benefits. Employee onboarding & offboarding. Creating and maintaining employee personnel files and ensuring employee information is up to date in the internal system. Application and renewal of work visas. Maintaining employee leave and training records. Administering medical and other insurance as per Company policy. Preparing monthly HR reports for management. Managing various aspects of HR Operations including employee documentation, on-boarding and off-boarding, insurance and HR audits. Creating, implementing and administering human resources policies and procedures and ensuring that practices are compliant with statutory requirements and guidelines. Providing support for recruitment as required, including but not limited to conducting hiring needs analysis, conducting reference checks and employment contracts. Supporting employee relations by providing guidelines and clarifications on policies and their application. Managing employee benefits and claims administration. Working closely with finance and/or outsourced vendors to ensure timely and accurate processing of payroll and other claims. Developing a portfolio of clients and candidates within your area of focus. Managing recruitment assignments from sourcing talent through to successful placements. Assisting in salary negotiations and offer management. Achieving revenue and activity targets. Providing candidates and clients with advice on market trends. Other adhoc works such as preparing work certificates etc. Managing a team of 1-5 people. Defining and leading projects focused on continuous improvement. Ideal Profile You have at least 1 year experience including solid experience in a similar role within Retail. You ideally possess solid experience in Agency Recruiter. Strong knowledge of legal and statutory requirements pertaining to HR practices. You have solid experience in a regional role ideally including experience covering Southeast Asia. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact and build credibility across all levels of the organisation. You pay strong attention to detail and deliver work that is of a high standard You are a strong team player who can manage multiple stakeholders You are adaptable and thrive in changing environments What's on Offer? Regional Role A role that offers a breadth of learning opportunities Join a market leader within Retail Opportunity to make a positive impact

Job_Title: Supervisor, Security Coordinator (Bangkok)
Job_Description: Req15950 Location: Gemopolis Industrail Park, Bangkok, Thailand Key objectives: Ensure production and business receives right security support and coverage. Key duties: Execute tasks in accordance to the direction set by central security. Respond to emergency situations according to procedure (i.e., fire, strike & protest, theft, threats). Monitor and control outsourced security contractor operations & performance to ensure compliance to SLAs; provide feedback to centralize security. Support HR (Employee Relations) on fraud / security breach case investigation. Conduct security trainings for employees and contractors; lead security awareness and prevention programs at production site. Provide feedback to central security. Provide monthly report  (guard KPIs, incidents report and other security report related to security trends). Qualifications: Bachelor degree of Human resources, Political Science, Law, Business Management or related fields, Minimum 3 years of experience to Physical security management in manufacturing environment or relevant experiences, Experience to Security contract management, Security case investigation or coordination with government officer is preferable, Good knowledge on the Security System, tools and equipment and Security business process, Skill and experience to Human resource management, Good skill to Leadership, Negotiation, Teamwork, Facilitation, Evaluation and Communication Good computer skill to Microsoft (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), Milestone software(CCTV), Access control software, Intrusion software etc., Preferred Competency; Drive the solution to most complex business problems,Possess the strategic perspective and create sustained results for Pandora (financial, non-financial), Demonstrate ability to make hard decisions, making the right trade-offsEffectively plan and efficiently deliver exceptional work while handling both volume and complexity, Is an inspirational leader; practices genuine humility and places the team above their own interests, Is self-motivated and hungry enough to work hard; willing to change, Is smart about other people; has an ability to lead, manage, motivate, and run own team of future leaders, Strong stakeholder management and communication skills; interact effectively with the organization

Job_Title: Sales Support
Job_Description: ABOUT THE ROLE This position will be under oil & gas department. Manage customer service activities including enquiry, customer satisfaction, escalated, to ensure customer service creates competitive advantage in marketplace including resolving critical customer complaints and meet customer satisfaction. WHAT YOU WILL BE DONING Render full customer service Customers and communicate well to ensure their requirements are met. Coordinate with Bollore network /supplier to obtain cost. Ensure quotation will be issued on time. Closely monitor shipment /service as scheduled. Support BDM Oil and Gas with freight solutions. Ensure invoice will be billed to customer after shipment /service complete. Ensure all report will be submitted on time. Additional duties as assigned. Attending meeting with customer when required. Requirements THE SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE Minimum 3 years’ experience in international freight forwarding industry and in customer service or operations roles. Oil & Gas experiences are preferable. Background in finance / administrative / accounting Good computer skill in MS Office: Word and Excel Strong networking and communication skills externally and internally Ability to cultivate and build strong relationship with customers Conscientious and able to work under pressure Good command in English Benefits Provident Fund after passed probation Group Insurance: Health (IPD&OPD), Accident, and Dental Fixed & Performance Bonus Annual Leave start from 12 days/year

Job_Description: <<ENTER DISPLAY JOB TITLE>> B1-B2 Floor Siam Paragon, 991 Rama 1 Road; PathumwanBangkok, CENTRAL THAILAND, 10330Thailand Everyone Matters at Merlin. At Merlin we welcome the world to our magical attractions and resorts every day and we want to reflect that same multicultural mix inside our business too. We strive to create an inclusive and diverse workplace where people can be themselves, have the same opportunities and thrive together. Because at Merlin, everyone matters! Together, we work to create a workplace where everyone feels valued, no matter their age, race, gender, disability or sexual orientation. Although we understand that we'll always be learning and growing, we aim to be the most inclusive and flexible employer in our industry.

Job_Title: Associate, Data Collection
Job_Description: Associate, Data Collection - 008OFF Job Title :  Associate, Data Collection Team :  Data Collection, Bangkok Direct reports :  Team Leader, Data Collection (Vasawan Sriwongsa – Tan) Office Base:  Bangkok, Thailand Key relationships: ·         Internal - Client Manager Team and Global Data Operations Team ·         External - Customers, Vendors and Schneider’s third party partners Position Summary: We are looking for a qualified Associate to manage Global Data Collection works and will work with tenured Data Operations Team members.  You will be responsible to collecting data from several Invoice Sources such as collecting invoices from supplier websites, collecting invoices from suppliers by email, collecting invoices from customer portals, chasing site contacts, requesting invoices from customers and etc. This includes maintaining data required around those.  Additional tasks include but are not limited to data downloading, chasing, answering data questions related to data collection work, data management and etc Position responsibilities: ·         Day to Day Tasks ·         Provides quality customer service, including interacting with customers, answering customer enquiries, and effectively handling customer complaints (both internal and external customers) ·         Managing Data through the systems ·         Learn about the business, department and associated processes and tools ·         Escalate issues to ensure best service will be served ·         Adhere to Schneider Electric processes ·         Other duties as assigned Qualifications Essential skills and qualifications: ·         Bachelor’s degree ·         Good PC skills, especially Microsoft Office ·         Strong oral and written communication Skills (English and Chinese) ·         Special language skill is an advantage ·         Ability to organize and manage multiple priorities ·         Self-motivated ·         Provide excellent customer service internally and externally ·         Inquisitive – willing to investigate to find answers to problems ·         Work well on teams, within and outside of function ·         High commitment to company vision and values Character requirements: ·         Initiative: recognizes and acts on what needs to be done without being asked to do it ·         Thoroughness: pays close attention to detail and produces accurate work in a timely fashion ·         Decisiveness: has the ability to sort through information and make appropriate and timely decisions ·         Diligence: energized by being diligent in meeting deadlines and completing tasks on time ·         Discernment: ability to understand long-term impacts of an action ·         Attentiveness: ability to devote undivided attention to a task ·         Service: is committed to serving clients with a high degree of professionalism ·         Can-do attitude: confident and willing to deal with problems or new tasks Primary Location : TH-Bangkok Schedule : Full-time Unposting Date : Ongoing

Enjoy traveling and meeting new people, and having fun to show Bangkok to your guests Either newly graduated from the school or having working experience, you are welcome FULL TIME AND PART TIME (Be able to work at least 3 days a week) are welcome. สวัสดิการ -ประกันสังคม -สวัสดิการตามกฏหมายกำหนด เช่น ค่าโอที หรือ เงินพิเศษสำหรับวันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ -วันพักร้อนประจำปี -ท่องเที่ยวประจำปี -ส่วนลดห้องพักกับร้านอาหาร -ทิปรวม -โบนัสประจำปี (ขึ้นอยู่กับผลประกอบการ) เวลาทำงาน ประจำ เงินเดือน 18,000 ++ บาท สนใจติดต่อ คุณศิลา แสงสวัสดิ์ เบอร์โทร 099-159-9595 เว็บไซต์ http://www.jamhostelbangkok.com JAM Hostel Bangkok JAM Hostel Bangkok

Job_Title: Recruitment Coordinator (Luxury/High-end Retail)
Job_Description: Company Description Allegis Global Solutions is founded on a culture that is passionate about transforming the way the world acquires talent by delivering client-focused solutions that make a difference for businesses worldwide. From refining how you manage your contingent workforce to strengthening your employer brand to recruit top talent, our integrated talent solutions drive the business results you need. As an industry leader, we draw upon decades of experience to design innovative tools, products and processes. We develop competitive practices that position organizations for growth and we deliver the insight needed to succeed in today’s global marketplace. Job Description Come join the AGS family, on this chic and very well-known high-end retail brand right here in Bangkok! Recruitment Process Delivery Provide key support to Recruitment Specialists and the wider recruitment team in completing designated recruitment activities within agreed timeframes Drafting and printing of offer letters and ensure all timely processing adhere to turnaround times. Ensuring accuracy on offer letter drafts, realistic start dates and all required clauses are correctly input Conducting relevant checks in the ATS to ensure data integrity and escalating to relevant parties for missing information. Ensure accurate and up to date information is recorded on the database candidate profile and candidate has been moved through appropriate workflow activity stages Supporting 'high touch' interview scheduling for the Recruitment Specialist. Support the Admin team lead by delivery of administrative duties and ad-hoc tasks (invoicing/ reporting/ training) Adhere to recruitment process as designed, ensuring appropriate approvals at relevant stages and ensure the up to date documentation of the recruitment processes Identify opportunities for, or contribute to, developing continuous improvement and innovation in the recruitment delivery process. Ensure all administrative process questions request are responded to in a timely manner/agreed timeframes, and to quality standard as agreed Working closely with recruiters to understand their issues and assist in resolving problems as a team Pro-actively identify where support may be needed and act accordingly Candidate Management Provide support to Recruitment Specialists in the management of candidates as required. Meeting candidates for contract sign ups & onboarding and ensuring a great candidate experience Assisting the onboarding specialist in candidate onboarding and induction events Qualifications Experience Prior experience in a fast paced, client facing administration function ideally within the staffing industry or Corporate HR within a global organization Successful experience managing multiple tasks, and stakeholders at the same time Worked in a team environment that emphasized group contribution Must have excellent communication and interpersonal skills A sound understanding of in-house Recruitment best practice Ability to write client oriented communications e.g. e-mails, interview arrangements Functional computer skills and software knowledge, prior experience in using a ATS (Applicant Tracking System) experience would be advantageous Proven ability to multi-task with high attention to detail Proven ability to perform under pressure and under tight deadlines Additional Information As a workplace, we focus on relationships – with each other, our clients and our candidates - in fact serving others is one of our core values. We support open communication and recognize that giving constructive criticism can be even harder than receiving it. We appreciate the fearless and the passionate, who force us to be better. Everything we do sits on a pillar of diversity - diverse perspectives, backgrounds and ideas drive innovation and make us successful. See what it’s like to work at AGS by searching #LifeAtAGS on any social network.

Job_Title: Regional Trade Sales Manager - APAC
Job_Description: <<ENTER DISPLAY JOB TITLE>> B1-B2 Floor Siam Paragon, 991 Rama 1 Road; PathumwanBangkok, CENTRAL THAILAND, 10330Thailand Everyone Matters at Merlin. At Merlin we welcome the world to our magical attractions and resorts every day and we want to reflect that same multicultural mix inside our business too. We strive to create an inclusive and diverse workplace where people can be themselves, have the same opportunities and thrive together. Because at Merlin, everyone matters! Together, we work to create a workplace where everyone feels valued, no matter their age, race, gender, disability or sexual orientation. Although we understand that we'll always be learning and growing, we aim to be the most inclusive and flexible employer in our industry.

Job_Title: เจ้าหน้าที่ลูกค้าสัมพันธ์ / Support Sales
Company: Better World Green Public Company Limited
Job_Description:
จำนวนอัตรา 1 จังหวัด กรุงเทพ ระดับการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี สาขาการจัดการ , การตลาด , คอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง รายละเอียด ทุกเพศ อายุระหว่าง 22 - 35 ปี ปริญญาตรี สาขาการจัดการ , การตลาด , คอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ MS Office และ Internet ได้เป็นอย่างดี มีความรับผิดชอบสูง ความละเอียดรอบคอบ และสามารถทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้เป็นอย่างดี ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่พิจารณาจากประสบการณ์ฝึกงาน *** ทำงานจันทร์ - เสาร์ (เสาร์เว้นเสาร์)**** สวัสดิการ 1. กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ 2. ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี 3. โบนัส 4. ค่าตอบแทนในการมาทำงานสม่ำเสมอ 5. เบี้ยเลี้ยงการปฏิบัติงานนอกสถานที่กรณีค้างคืน 6. ค่าที่พัก ค่าพาหนะ กรณีปฏิบัติงานนอกสถานที่ 7. ชุดยูนิฟอร์ม 8. ประกันอุบัติเหตุ 9. ประกันสังคม กองทุนเงินทดแทน 10. ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี 11. งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ประจำปี 12. การฝึกอบรมสัมมนา 13. เงินช่วยเหลือพนักงาน (งานแต่ง,งานบวช,คลอดบุตร หรือเงินช่วยเหลืองานศพ(บิดา,มารดา,ภรรยา,บุตร และตัวลูกจ้าง) เวลาทำงาน ประจำ เงินเดือน ตามโครงสร้างบริษัท / ค่าคอมมิชชั่น บาท สนใจติดต่อ คุณน้ำ เบอร์โทร 02-012-7888 Ext. 213 , 088-022-3955 (สำนักงานใหญ่), 092-257-0795 (ศูนย์สระบุรี) เว็บไซต์ http://www.betterworldgreen.com,http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6uzwl93jr-Q Better World Green Public Co., Ltd. Job_Description:

Job_Title: เจ้าหน้าที่สินทรัพย์ระบบสารสนเทศ
Job_Description:
ลักษณะงาน : งานประจำ (Full time) ประสบการณ์ขั้นต่ำ : 2ปี รายละเอียดงาน : 1. ควบคุมการเบิก – จ่าย รวมถึงจัดทำรายงานการเบิกสต็อคคลังสินทรัพย์อุปกรณ์สารสนเทศของฝ่ายเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ และดูแลและจัดเก็บแฟ้มเอกสารต่างๆเช่น ใบเบิก ขอยืม ของกลุ่มงานพัฒนาและสนับสนุนสารสนเทศให้เรียบร้อยและสามารถสืบค้นได้
2. ให้บริการและติดตามสถานะการยืมสินทรัพย์และอุปกรณ์สารสนเทศแก่หน่วยงานภายในโรงพยาบาล รวมถึงติดตามการคืนสินทรัพย์ทางคอมพิวเตอร์ของบุคลากรที่พ้นสภาพ และจัดทำเอกสารการโอนย้ายสินทรัพย์ให้แก่ส่วนจัดซื้อ
3. ส่งซ่อมและติดตามสถานะการซ่อมสินทรัพย์ และอุปกรณ์สารสนเทศ
4. ตรวจสอบความถูกต้องของสินทรัพย์ และอุปกรณ์สารสนเทศ ก่อนที่จะนำเก็บเข้าห้อง Computer Store
5. ติดตามสถานะของการให้บริการ ติดตั้ง ยืมอุปกรณ์สารสนเทศของกลุ่มงานพัฒนาและสนับสนุนสารสนเทศ
6. ประสานงานการแจ้งให้บริการติดตั้งกับหน่วยงานภายในและภายนอก เพื่อแจ้งให้ทีม IT Support ดำเนินการ
7. ประสานงานการจัดซื้อ จัดหาสินทรัพย์ เช่น เครื่องคอมพิวเตอร์ อุปกรณ์ Network Server เพื่อขอใบเสนอราคา จัดเตรียมเอกสารการจัดซื้อและจัดหา และประสานงานกับส่วนจัดซื้อ เพื่อดำเนินการจัดซื้อ จัดจ้าง
8. จัดทำเอกสารขออนุมัติความเห็นชอบจากมหาวิทยาลัยมหิดล ทำประกาศเผยแพร่การขอซื้อประจำปี และหลักการขอซื้อ ขอจ้าง เพื่อดำเนินการจัดซื้ออุปกรณ์สารสนเทศ รวมถึงติดตามสถานะการจัดซื้อ และจัดทำรายงานเสนอผู้บังคับบัญชา
9. ควบคุมดูแล ติดตามสถานะของสัญญาฝ่ายเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ เช่น สัญญาการบำรุงรักษาอุปกรณ์สารสนเทศ สัญญาจัดจ้างที่ปรึกษา/Sub Contract และจัดทำรายงานการต่ออายุสัญญา เพื่อเสนอผู้บังคับบัญชา สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : กรุงเทพมหานคร (บางกอกน้อย , บางพลัด) คุณสมบัติผู้สมัครงาน : - ป.ตรี บัญชี 
- มีประสบการณ์ด้านการบริหารคลัง/สินทรัพย์ 2-3 ปี รายละเอียดเพิ่มเติม : ฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคล โทร : 02-419-1917 Email : recruit@siphhospital.com Facebook : SiPH Career สมัครงาน

Job_Title: Executive Assistant
Job_Description: Main purpose of the role: Collaborative; Openly engage stakeholders for critical activities. Take accountability and ensure effective collaboration with all shared services functions. Key accountabilities: •    Manage and maintain executive’s schedules, meeting, appointments and provide reminders regarding upcoming meetings, events or anything requiring a collective action from the team members. •    Arrange and coordinate meetings and events, prepare meeting room and other necessary facilities. •    Arrange travel, accommodation, itineraries, and all correspondence related to arrangements as needed. •    Handle confidential information, maintain an organized filing system of paper and electronic documents. •    Handle incoming and outgoing documents for the executive’s consideration. •    Greeting and directing visitors. •    Assist with projects as required. •    Miscellaneous administrative support as required (e.g. Letters, presentations, correspondence, expense reports, etc.). We're looking for person with competencies: •    Communication skills; Communicate clearly, both in writing and verbally, in order to build trust and cultivate relationships with clients, coworkers, and executives, •    Time Management; Prioritize and plan work activities as to use time efficiently while handling a high volume, diverse workload, •    Multitasking; Able to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and ability to work under the pressure, •    Integrity; Trustworthy enough to handle sensitive/confidential information and being able to comprehend and act on complex, sensitive matters, •    Analytical and problem-solving skills; Identify issues and resolve problems in a timely manner using creativity and good judgment, •    Customer service skills; Provide help and support when needed with service mind, •    Administrative skills; Demonstrate proficiency in computer word processing, spreadsheet, database applications. Understand financial/HR processes and applications. Basic Qualifications: •    Bachelor’s degrees to any fields study, •    Minimum 3 years of experience working, preferably as an executive assistant or related, •    Good command in written and spoken English, •    Good computer skills
